anime.description: http://anidb.net/cr1550 [Saibara Rieko]`s humorous semi-autobiographical manga about her life raising her two children has been printed in the Mainichi Newspaper`s weekly morning edition since 2002. The series won a Japan Media Arts Festival Award in 2004 and the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2005.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: moe
tag.description: Moe is a Japanese slang loanword that refers to feelings of strong affection mainly towards characters in anime, manga, and video games. Moe, however, has also gained usage to refer to feelings of affection towards any subject. Moe can be related to lust; however, pure lust without other feelings is considered outside its scope. The word Moe originated in the late 1980s and early 1990s in Japan and is of uncertain origin, although there are several theories on how it came into use. At the anime level, the http://anidb.net/t7146 [cute girls doing cute things (CGDCT)] tag may also apply. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: setting
tag.description: The setting describes in what time and place an anime takes place. To a certain extent it describes what you can expect from the world in the anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: time
tag.description: This placeholder lists different epochs in human history and more vague but important timelines such as the future, the present and the past.

tag.name: place
tag.description: The places the anime can take place in. Includes more specific places such as a country on Earth, as well as more general places such as a dystopia or a mirror world.

tag.name: mina
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, the word mina refers to a broad audience, which can be said to be "the entire family", from the grumpy grandpa to the newborn baby. In Japanese, the word means simply "everyone", and has no anime/manga-related connotations at all. It does not comprise a style or a genre per se, but rather indicates the publisher`s intended target demographic. Mina works are deliberately targeted at a range of people as wide as possible, and are commonly associated with high-budget releases that require a very large audience to be financially viable. They usually bring mildly philosophical themes so that the adults can be interested, but do so without bringing objectionable content so that the children can be allowed to watch, and indeed also feature content specifically geared to spark their interest.

tag.name: present
tag.description: Somewhere between past and future.

tag.name: Earth
tag.description: The Earth is the third planet from the Sun, and the densest and fifth-largest of the eight planets in the Solar System. It is in effect a ball of hot mud, but on the surface it`s cold enough, so most of us live on it (or are supposed to). It is circa 4.5 billion years old, and, unless we humans succeed in destroying it over the next couple of centuries, it is expected to last for quite another while, though the changes in the Sun`s emissions due to its aging will likely cause the extinction of everything; the species of earthlings are guaranteed to die, even if we fail to kill them -- unless, of course, we find ourselves another planet and figure out a way to take everything there. Our little planet on a corner of this galaxy may mean nothing in the grand scheme of things, but to its inhabitants it is their home, so, as a species, we cherish it dearly, to the point many cultures even to this day deify it. Being the home to the human civilizations, the Earth is the main setting of most fiction, be it anime or otherwise, but not only are many titles set in other places, such as unrelated fantasy worlds, in a considerable number of fictional titles the Earth is actually destroyed by aggressive alien invaders.

tag.name: Japan
tag.description: Japan is a sovereign island nation in East Asia. Located in the Pacific Ocean, it lies off the eastern coast of the Asian mainland and stretches from the Sea of Okhotsk in the north to the East China Sea and China in the southwest. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: Asia
tag.description: Asia is Earth`s largest and most populous continent, located primarily in the eastern and northern hemispheres and sharing the continental landmass of Eurasia with the continent of Europe. Asia covers an area of 44,579,000 square kilometers, about 30% of Earth`s total land area and 8.7% of the Earth`s total surface area. The continent, which has long been home to the majority of the human population, was the site of many of the first civilizations. Asia is notable for not only its overall large size and population, but also dense and large settlements as well as vast barely populated regions within the continent of 4.4 billion people. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: daily life
tag.description: The antics of the protagonists do not take place in some exotic setting or time, but in everyday life. When not "at the job" this means getting up in the morning, making meals, house cleaning, going shopping or out to eat, visiting the bath house or spa, leisure activities in the spare time, etc. The time "on the job" for students is School Life, for others working in their profession. Daily Life is basically a synonym for everything normal, repetitive, and trivial happening to your average person.

tag.name: the arts
tag.description: The arts represent an outlet of human expression, usually influenced by culture, and driven by human creative impulse. Major constituents of the arts include literature – including poetry, novels and short stories, and epics; performing arts – among them music, dance, and theatre; culinary arts such as baking, chocolatiering, and winemaking; media arts like photography and film, and visual arts – including drawing, painting, and sculpting. Some art forms combine a visual element with performance (e.g. film) and the written word (e.g. comics). From prehistoric cave paintings to modern day films, art serves as a vessel for storytelling and conveying mankind`s relationship with its environment. Source: Wiki

tag.name: funny expressions
tag.description: The facial expressions of the characters may change so quickly or unexpectedly distort that hilarity will ensue.

tag.name: intact family
tag.description: The main character`s family is a so-called "nuclear family". Wherein both parents are alive and present in his or her life. This is actually relatively rare for anime, where "parental abandonment" is the norm.

tag.name: mundane made awesome
tag.description: Sometimes normal just doesn`t cut it. Eating: you put food in your mouth and chew. Playing sports: you throw a ball around. You need to make it awesome, no matter how mundane it is. Let`s throw in some gripping orchestral music, lighting changes, different camera angles, something! Don`t write like a man, write like an evil overlord! Exaggerate your expressions and gestures, speak with excessive intonation, and if all else fails, throw in some close-ups, slow motion, and ominous Latin chanting! With practice, even you can turn something like eating chips into an epic battle of light and dark, blinding the viewer with sheer awesomeness. [Source: TV Tropes]

tag.name: TO BE MOVED TO CHARACTER
tag.description: Tags under this parent tag are going to be moved to character tags and removed from the anime they`re currently assigned to. They will be blocked from the anime system once that move is complete. Please help with that job if you know what characters they should be assigned to.

tag.name: tropes
tag.description: A trope is a commonly recurring literary and rhetorical devices, motifs or clichés in creative works. This use is a broader redefining of a literary trope, the use of figurative language, via word, phrase, or even an image, for artistic effect, such as using a figure of speech. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: べっちょり / 受けた / 太陽にほえろ / ごあいさつ / カニ母 / メール
Bedwetting / Response / The Sun Roars! / Greetings / Crab Mom / Mail
episode.summary: In these 6 hilarious shorts, Mainichi Kaasan shows us that from registering kids for pre-school to a crazy family trip to the beach, it`s no easy job being a mom! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漫画家かあさん / 漫画家かあさん大忙し / かんろく / びゅっ
Manga Artist Mom / Mom, the manga artist / Scheme / Gush
episode.summary: Mom is a cartoonist and she has a deadline to make today. Despite this, she makes breakfast for the kids, takes them to school, and ends up volunteering to help draw the poster for the Parents` Bazaar Day. Tomorrow, is Bunji`s birthday and he ends up getting sesame salt… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 精霊降臨 / 精霊の逆襲 / わたしをみて! / 兄妹
The Descent of the Spirit / The Descent of the Spirit / Look at me! / Brother and Sister
episode.summary: In these next shorts, mom is shocked that Bunji has poor hiragana recognition. In different efforts, she finally decides to help him improve but sometimes gets a bit impatient. Fumi absolutely loves batman and throws her batman figurine out when she discovers he has a girlfriend. Mom has promised to take Bunji and Fumi to the park this Sunday but her body is so tired that Bunji and Fumi decide to… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バザーは大変 / どとーの保育園 / もうしません / てのひら
The bazaar is really a pain / Aggressive nursery school / I won`t do it again! / On my palm
episode.summary: Mom worries that she doesn’t bring anything to the school’s bazaar, Bunji cries since he doesn’t get to buy a toy he wants, Bunji plays in the mud at the park washing away the dirt in an area meant for pets, and mom reminisces about the past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレは帰るぜ / そもそもね / うまいぞ / いっしょ
I`m going back / To start out with... / She`s good / Together
episode.summary: We learn about how Mom and Dad met in a jungle in Thailand, they go to a ramen shop with their kids, and dad makes Fumi promise to never leave and stay with him forever. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: じいちゃん / 基本です / しゅき / ばっしん
Grandpa / It`s a fact / I love you / Slam
episode.summary: We follow the family as we find out that Mom was raised in a small fishing village in Kochi, Fumi works her manipulative ways to get what she wants at times but ruins her new dress in the next short, and finally Dad, who works as a cameraman, one day returns home and sees Bunji who he hasn’t seen in a long time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴボゴボ / わるくない / かいじゅう / プッツン
Splish, splash / I did nothing wrong / Monster / Puzzun
episode.summary: Mom is leisurely shopping with Fumi when she needs to go to the bathroom so rushes there but…; Bunji is out with his friend while Fumi is home with Mom pouting since she would rather be out – Mom is about to lose her patience; Deadlines are piling up so Mom needs to work on Sunday but her children want to go out to play; Perhaps, Italian cuisine? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お片付け / 九九 / やる気 / やる気出す
Clean up / Multiplication tables / Motivation / Bring out your motivation
episode.summary: We see mom scolding Bunji for not cleaning up even though she hates doing it herself; After cleaning, they take out an electronic multiplication table that Fumi and Bunji start playing with. Mom is a bit hesitant since she is not so good with the multiplication table; One day, Mom is surprised when Bunji states his desire to study so she takes him to the hospital where they find nothing wrong with him. But, is there anything wrong with his body? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: しるがでた / やっぱり, ムリ! / ランドセル / ゆめ
Impossible after all! / Juice came out / Backpack / Dream
episode.summary: Mom`s favorite willow tree was covered with caterpillars which she abors; Bunji is not always well behaved, so the discipline Gods scold Mom and urge her to improve in this area; Fumi suddenly wants a backpack so grandma makes her one but she doesn’t like it; Seeing the beautiful sunset, Mom and the kids take a stroll when Mom asks them what they want to be when they grow up. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脱走 / いぬはそと / わがはいはいぬである / また脱走
Escaping / Dogs stay outside / I am a dog / Escape again
episode.summary: John, the pet dog, is good at escaping and the whole family goes out to look for him; Bunji and Fumi let John inside the house despite mom’s petition that he’s an outside dog. Guess what John brings for mom…; When John didn’t have a name, Bunji called him “Batman” and Fumi called him “Butterfly”. Despite what they called him, he always responded happily; John manages to escape again but this time, they can’t find him… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さあ食え / 解禁 / お前がわるい / 親の背中
Come on, eat / Lift the ban / You are bad / Parents` example
episode.summary: Mom wrote about strange foods that aren`t normally eaten in Japan in her manga when one day, Bunji wants to eat something that`s unthinkable; Even though they heard that you become a fool if you eat sweets, Bunji and Fumi still want to eat them; Fumi makes up a story and tells it at home and at school. Mom was concerned about this so she asks Fumi why she created a story and was surprised to hear her answer; On occasion, Mom will go out at night with those she knows from work as her reward where she gets pretty drunk. However, looking at the faces of Bunji and Fumi while they are asleep is really the biggest reward. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いそがしい / 男の子のおかあさん / そう, それ! / 台所
Busy / Boys` Mom / Yes, that`s it! / Kitchen
episode.summary: Whenever Bunji needs to go to the bathroom, he is known for not being able to hold it and has a bad habit of continuing to play despite his need to go; Bunji was covered in dirt when mom came to pick him up. She let him be and joined Morita-san and Nagasaki-san as they began to talk about being a mother of sons; Bunji is running all over the place sticking beans in his ears, a doll`s hand in his nose and digging himself a hole. Mom is speechless when Fumi says…; Fumi didn`t cry when going to school but that’s because… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひと工夫 / この日だけは! / もうイヤ / セミの声
Twist / Just this day! / I can`t take this anymore / A locust`s call
episode.summary: In order for mom to finish up the manuscript, she told Bunji to go play but you`ll never guess what he did; The day of the deadline - Since grandma wasn`t around, mom had to feed the kids and go to work afterwards. However, she didn`t make their favorite food...; Mom was working all night long and just when she thought she could take a break, Bunji and Fumi catch a cold where mom must nurse them back to health; Bunji, Fumi, and grandma go back to Kochi. Mom was planning on enjoying some alone time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: してやったり / めっ / うつるんです / 夜道
Do whatever / Sorry / It`s contagious / Street at night
episode.summary: Again, Bunji chooses to continue playing even though he needs to go to the bathroom so he ends up peeing himself. That`s when the discipline Gods appear before the exhausted mom; Mom always points out how good of a child Fumi is but on occasion, she unexpectedly scolds her quite harshly. On that particular day, she punished her mistakenly; Recently, Fumi has been acting strangely giving Bunji some attitude; One evening, mom forgot about something she had to take care of and ended up rushing out of the house without her bag. She went to give Bunji and Fumi the things they forgot but it started to get late... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふるさと / あずき洗い / 父の名前 / 青いところ
Hometown / Bean Washer / Dad`s name / Blue place
episode.summary: The family went back to mom`s hometown, Tosa. Somehow, the heat is different from Tokyo`s so they are fully enjoying the countryside. Rumor is, there is a ghost that appears in "Hell`s Valley" when Bunji and Fumi go exploring; Mom and her older brother unexpectedly went to their parents` home. Mom didn`t know everything about her real dad and for the first time, her brother begins to speak of him; Mom and her brother took the Buddhist tablet and the picture of their dad to bring back to their homes which was a secret between them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夏休みは終わらない / まだ夏休みは終わらない / まだまだ夏休みは終わらない / まだまだまだ夏休みは終わらない
Summer vacation is not over yet / Summer vacation is still not over / Not yet, not yet. Summer vacation is not over yet / Not yet, not yet, not yet. Summer vacation is not over.
episode.summary: Taking advantage of the summer holidays, the family goes to Singapore. Bunji is amazed by everything and becomes the laughing stock but kids from other countries seem to do the same; Bunji is ecstatic to see a water slide at the pool when the stronger Russian, Misha appears. Bunji can`t create quite as big of a splash as Misha; After Singapore, they are off to the Philippines to meet up with dad who shows them around; Bunji and Fumi are around the same age as the street children who are begging for money. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ツイてる? / 似てる? / ほめどころ? / うしろ姿
Lucky? / Be alike? / Find a way to praise them? / Look at the back
episode.summary: It`s been a while since dad has been home. He mentions how girls are better since Fumi is emotionally attached while Bunji is a bit hurt; Dad went barhopping while Bunji went to friend`s after friend`s house. Mom lectured them respectively; Bunji`s teacher complimented his artwork despite his lack of talent which mom learns from; Dad made some time and played with the kids as much as possible. They sat on his lap while watching TV. Mom was earnestly looking from behind which reminded her of her own dad. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脂をのせて / さとり / バーベキュー / 親友
To attain enlightenment / Sucking up the fat / Barbecue / Close friends
episode.summary: Mom is trying to reach her work deadline when she receives a call from Chi-kun’s mother who’s down with a cold which puts mom in a pinch; Mom and Bunji went to Iwamura’s house where there are four boys. They are tough boys and usually place baseball at home; They went camping with another family by the riverbed. Dad claimed to be the Commander Fire when Bunji and the other boys began to set up the portable stove; Bunji and the other kids swam in the river, caught rhinoceros beetles in the mountains, and fully enjoy the camping trip. However, Bunji’s rhinoceros beetle went missing so everyone began searching… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さくせん / しおひがり / おたますくい / 小かあさん
Strategy / Gathering shells at low tide / Collect tadpoles / Mini-mom
episode.summary: Today is the day that everyone is going to the amusement park. However, mom is trying to avoid going by having Ma-kun’s mom and Chi-kun’s mom take the kids; Bunji and the other kids are having a jolly time gathering shells while the mothers let out a sigh. They see a mother and daughter walk gracefully before them; Bunji & Fumi go to a nearby pond to catch tadpoles. Dad began to tell them about how tadpoles turn into frogs; Unexpectedly, Bunji and Fumi were the only ones in the house. Fumi suddenly missed her mom and began to cry. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あしたから / ちゃんとあしたから / 夜のおはなし / ぜいたくな悩み
Starting tomorrow / Seriously, starting tomorrow / Bedtime stories / Luxurious worry
episode.summary: Bunji doesn’t keep a calm composure when crossing the street which worries Mom that one day he will get into an accident. On day, Bunji was late so mom couldn’t help but…; Grandma and Bunji are left at home as Fumi goes shopping with Mom. If Bunji went as well, he would enjoy it at the beginning but he would gradually turn the other way; Mom begins to read Taro’s book to Bunji and Fumi. But from one of Bunji’s simple questions, the talk of Taro begins to gradually escalate; In order to teach the kids to become independent, Mom told them to go to bed on their own. However, the two weren’t used to it so they tried every which way to not be separated from their mom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チョップ / なりたい / かあさんの知恵袋 ~せんたく編~ / んぎゃー, がばっ/お蔵出し
Chop / Want to become / Mom`s knowledge: laundry compilation / Contact
episode.summary: Bunji is unable to express his gratitude to people. Mom must try tactics from the advice given to her by the spirits of early childhood education; Recently, Fumi has an aspiration to become a model. When asked why she wants to be a beautiful lady, she has a surprising answer; Mothers with sons are always concerned when they do laundry but what is mom’s secret technique?; In town, there is the sound of a child crying when all of a sudden, a bunch of middle-aged women gather around. Back in the days, mom never understood why people did this but now she is one of them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どけどけどけ / ビーム / たからもの / なかよし
Dokedoke / Beam / Treasure / Close friends
episode.summary: Like always, mom is taking the kids on the bike as she is huffing and puffing biking up a hill. As she is riding, she sees another homemaker speeding right past her on an electric bike; Mom noticed when she started to lecture Bunji, a beam came from his head and he wasn’t listening. Today, his beam also appears and he begins his communication; Out of nowhere, Fumi said that she wants her own room so she went to ask her dad; Bunji and Ma-kun have a falling out. Even though he is upset over the phone, Bunji asks Ma-kun over to play. They have a huge fight again so mom gives up on them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨上がりの像 / くちげんか / 消えたかあさん / 祭りの夜
The scene after it rains / Argument / Disappearing Mom / The Night Festival
episode.summary: In order for the kids to show off at the kindergarten athletic meet, Dad starts a strict training regimen. But, due to inclimate weather, the meet is cancelled; Upon heading to the park after the rain, Dad is delighted to see the sun be out. Bunji gets into an argument with a friend, but he says a bunch of things they don`t understand; Mom begins to lecture Bunji about quarrels, but...; Mom`s deadline is fast approaching and Dad, Fumi, and Bunji are romping around like usual. Before they realize it, Mom is nowhere to be seen... Did she run away?; The family goes to a local festival. They eat yakisoba, do target practice, and visit the night vendors. Dad, now drunk, goes all out in a battle at the ball throwing stand... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぶんじのヒミツ / ぶんじ, 一年生 / 最後のカニ母 / ああ保育園
Bunji`s Secret / Bunji, First Grade Student / The Last Crab Mom / Ah, Nursery School
episode.summary: Bunji becomes a first grader, at long last. That morning, Dad tells Bunji that he is to become a chosen, special first grader. Bunji believes these words and sets off for school...; Mom is more worried than ever due to the fact that Bunji`s entering elementary school. The more she thinks about it, the more nervous she gets, to the point where she can`t even effectively get work done.; And then the crab arrives! Mom was planning to hog it all for herself and not tell anyone about it, but Grandma notices.; The elementary school day begins earlier than kindergarten did. Mom has to wake up extra early to take Bunji to school. Plus he has homework which he needs help with. Mom is getting burned out by this routine, when she had to stay up all night to finish work and then take Bunji to school and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男子たるもの / 三バカ / 女の単位 / うたたねへの道
What It Means To Be a Boy / Three Stupid Boys / Feminine Charms / The Road to Napping
episode.summary: Bunji comes home after losing a fight. Mom thinks that, since Dad is never around, Bunji never learned how to fight. So, she starts the "Men`s intensive training month."; Bunji, Ma, and Chi, all good friends, form an idiotic trio. The three of them are always so lively! Then, on a rainy day, they`re all in the Kamohara home...; Through her work, Mom meets an idol and is impressed by the many feminine charms she has. Hearing her speak, Mom, in a flurry of stupidity, forces poor Fumi to dance.; It`s early afternoon and Mom is sleeping, not doing any work. Just before, Bunji almost did something very dangerous, but he got away okay. She feels so relieved and dozes off... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: じゃりっパゲ / ヘソのゴマ / すぅすぅ / ボーイズトーク
A Little Bald Spot / Sesame Seeds of the Belly Button / Zzzzz... / Boy Talk
episode.summary: Mom spots a large bald spot on the back of Bunji`s head. The Spirit of Early Education freaks Mom out when he tells her that it`s a boy`s spirit callingfor help due to being neglected by his parents. Mom tried to improve her lax attitude towards Bunji, but...; Bunji can`t calm down and can`t sit still for lunch or going to the bathroom. That behavior just makes his school teacher say that "Bunji sure has a strong sense of curiosity." Mom was impressed by this, but...; Mom goes to wake Fumi up after sending Bunji off to school. She is enticed by Fumi`s comfortable bed and drifts off to sleep herself, to the sound of Fumi`s breathing. She drifts off to dreamland. Then, Bunji, Ma, and Chi engage in a never-ending argument about peppers, which, incidentally, they all hate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 傘をさせ! / しりとり / ハロウィン / なじまず
Carry Umbrellas! / Shiritori / Halloween / Not a Good Fit
episode.summary: Mom picks up Bunji from school on a rainy day, with an umbrella in her hand. She notices responsible little girls and rambunctious little boys, without umbrellas, running about...; Dad apologizes profusely after Mom says she`ll divorce him if all he ever does is drink. Bunji hears this and asks what "divorce" means. He finds out it`s something scarier than a ghost; Mom and the gang get dressed up and walk around the neighborhood for Halloween. But, they are chased by a dog and get lectures by Dad who has no idea what Halloween is.; At the kindergarten Halloween party, there are a group of young moms who are enthusiastic about it, a group who have no idea what it is, and a group of randomly crazy foreign moms... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大地くん / ああ, 漢字 / 逃避 / 恥じらい
Daichi / Ah, Kanji / Escape / Shy
episode.summary: Bunji`s friend Daichi is always running around in short pants. One day, he comes across 17 turtles and brings them back to play with. Bunji is all excuses because he doesn`t want to study kanji. As Mom is stressed over the situation, the spirit of early education and spirit of educational enrichment appear before her. Of course, it turns into a fight as usual. Mom thinks that Fumi is tone-deaf, but actually it`s a trait handed down from her. Wanting to do something about it, Mom hastily buys a piano. The two start to practice, but... Bunji is worried his friends will see him holding hands with his mother at the crosswalk on their way to school, now that he`s an elementary school student. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 麦ちゃん5登場! / ピクニック / 麦ちゃんの秘密 / 死ななくてよかった
The Mugi Five Appear! / Picnic / Mrs. Mugi`s Secret / It`s okay as long as they don`t die
episode.summary: Mom gets to witness Mrs. Mugi and her five sons. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 読書時間 / 漢字 / 忍法娘 / おつかい
Reading Time / Kanji / Heart Signs / Errand
episode.summary: Mom is extremely worried because Bunji is showing zero interest in reading. Surprised that he cannot do math at all either, she makes him do math tables. Bunji then...; Bunji scores a 90 on his kanji test! The Kamohara household is delighted. When Mom tries to teach him the one he got wrong, Dad interrupts with his special kanji training!; Fumi hides under her bed and won`t come out. Mom brushes it off, but Dad sees it as a sign of her soul and many hijinks ensue.; Dad and Fumi go to the supermarket on an errand run. While Dad is trying to get a read on Fumi`s soul`s sign, he manages to get inebriated at a wine tasting they`re holding. Only then does Fumi open up... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いけいけブンジマン / 息子よ, どこに... / ガサ入れ / ぶんじの突撃友達んちの晩ご飯
Go Go, Bunji Man / Cleaning Frenzy / Dear son, where are you going... / Bunji`s Assault! Dinner at a Friend`s Place
episode.summary: The defender of justice, Bunji Man! He patrols the town looking for people in trouble, with Fumi and the others in tow. Upon doing so, he encounters a young boy trying to find a winning ice cream stick at a convenience store; Upon returning home from school, Bunji casually announces that he had an accident (#2) at school. Mom is startled and tells him that he must bear it and continue to focus, when that happens; That night, Mom, Mrs. Morita, and Mrs. Nagasaki gather at the school. They attempt to look for their children`s forgotten items. They brace themselves for the worse as they dig in, but keep finding unexpected things, one after another...; Bunji is invited to dinner at the stately residence of his classmate, Hiku. Bunji frolics around like usual as the butler, Mr. Yagi, grows concerned... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: こどもの時間 / 続こどもの時間 / のれた! / おとうと? / ひきざん / ひきざんの逆襲
Children`s Time / Continued... Children`s Time / Able to ride it! / Little Brother? / Subtraction / Subtraction Counterattack
episode.summary: Bunji is obsessed with his toy cars. Mom means to look after him, but because she doesn`t stop him, he drifts into the toy car`s soul. Bunji, Ma and Chi play in the mud again. They become the "fried oyster men"!; Bunji practices riding a bike. With Mom, Dad, and Grandma on his side, Daichi and him manage to pedal!; Fumi declares she wants a little brother. Mom tells her to make do with Jon instead. Fumi begins to treat Jon like her younger brother.; Bunji enters first grade and has trouble with subtraction. Mom takes advice from the spirit and buys him the easiest practice book she can. They vow to practice ten minutes a day, but...; Bunji`s troubles with subtraction continues. Mom makes him an exercise involving loaning money, but Bunji just says he won`t give the money back! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ザッツ・スーパー銭湯 / おままごと / 君が頼りだ / まんが家さん
That`s the super bath house / Playing House / You are reliable / Mrs. Manga Writer
episode.summary: Mom and the gang visit a super bathhouse! Dad is all fired up and causing a ruckus all over the place. He then encounters an elderly, hermit-like man called the "bathhouse chief."; Fumi`s friend Ako is over to play. While Mom isn`t looking, Bunji is drawn into a crazy session of playing house with the girls; The class representative from Bunji`s school, Nochiharu, is leaps and bounds a better student than Bunji. He begins to back Bunji up when playing and at school...; The girls from Bunji`s class come over to play. Something doesn`t feel right, and Mom has a bad feeling. Just as she thinks this, they say they want to see her draw manga... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白ふみちゃん黒ふみちゃん / 晴れぶたい / 大間違い / バカ大将
White Fumi, Black Fumi / Gala Occasion / Huge Mistake / Leader of Fools
episode.summary: Fumi and her rival, Kanna, battle it out to decide who gets to play Cinderella in the upcoming school play. Thus begins a strenuous battle between the mean "Black Fumi" and the kind and pure "White Fumi."; Eventually, they decide to let Fumi, Yuki, and Kanna all be Cinderella. The family watches the train wreck in bewilderment; Bunji and three of his stupid friends cannot remember last night`s homework. This leads into being scolded but having fun as well; The four of them are crawling around in the sandbox at the park. They don`t mind the pain as they continue to romp around and have fun. Unfortunately, Bunji decides he wants his stupidity to surpass all the others and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いけいけブンジマン2 / 母たちのお茶会 / 男の休日 / 欲望ツリー
Go Go, Bunji Man 2 / Mothers` Tea Party / Men`s Outing / Desire Tree
episode.summary: Defender of justice, Bunji Man. Once again, he rounds up Commander Fumi and goes to seek the town for people in need. He then encounters Daichi who is being picked on by some boys at a shop selling sweets; Back at home, Daichi`s mother and Mrs. Gonda are visiting. As Mrs. Gonda discusses her strong child rearing techniques, the topic of conversation turns to their three boys` report cards; On a day off, Bunji and Dad go to a conveyor belt sushi restaurant. Dad, teaching his son about sushi etiquette, proclaims, "You must start with the gyoku!" and "Don`t use chopsticks!" etc.; The Kamohara family`s wishes for Santa Claus to adorn their Christmas tree. A mix of the Japanese holiday, Tanabata, and Christmas. In them, you can see what the family members truly desire. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逃げろかあさん! / 天才芸 / 雪合戦 / 年の終わりに
Genius Performance / Run Away, Mom! / Snowball Fight / At the End of the Year
episode.summary: The family goes to visit Dad in the hospital. Each night, you can hear the cries of the cicada, well out of season. This starts a rumor about cicada ghosts being in the hospital; Mom awakes from a nap to the sound of Bunji and Fumi yelling "Jon!" She thinks something`s amiss, and sure enough, when she looks in the mirror she sees that she turned into Jon!; It`s the first time it`s snowed at the Kamogara house in a long time. They break up into two squads, managed by Mom and Dad respectively, and have a snowball fight. Mom uses her clever wit to slowly collapse Dad`s team; Mom and the family are shopping at a department store at New Year;s. Dad, in a rare display of generosity, offers to buy Bunji and Fumi one toy each. Mom asks, "What, I don`t get one?" Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 元旦 / はねつき / モチうまいね / マズイ
New Year`s Day / Japanese Badminton / Mochi is Delicious / Tastes Horrible
episode.summary: The family is back in Kochi for New Years break. The children are so excited for their otoshidama. Seeing this, Dad begins to tease them.; Mom`s brother and Dad go to teach the kids badminton, for fun, but it turns into a big competition between them so the kids wander off...; The family goes to a mochi making competition. Dad and Bunji enter the contest while Mom and Fumi help sell things. As soon as they start selling, the men rush in.; Bored with the New Year`s food, Mom begins to cook something that her father used to always make her just using flour and sugar. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動物園 / 野生のさけび / 男の早期教育 / 大好物
Zoo / Call of the Wild / Boy`s Early Education / Favorites
episode.summary: Dad gets mad when he sees a tiger on TV being so friendly to humans. He says he`s going to show his family what real tigers are like, and whisks them off to the zoo. Unfortunately, the tigers and lions didn`t get the memo...; The boss monkey at the monkey mountain threatens Dad. Dad, doing a great job imitating the monkey, appears to be having a conversation with him...; Bunji says he`s going to marry a girl from his class. Then, she makes him sign a contract to those words. Suddenly, the spirit of early education appears to let Mom know that this girl is just toying with Bunji`s emotions; Mom and Fumi are casually baking cookies on a calm afternoon. Suddenly, Fumi asks Mom if she`s ever kissed a man other than Dad! Mom quickly answers that she has. Fumi then... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いけいけブンジマン3 / ぷーちゃん, ぴーちゃん / 社会見学 / かんさつ日記
Go Go Bunji Man 3 / Little Pu, Little Pi / Public Field Trip / Observation Journal
episode.summary: Once again, Bunji Man is out on patrol to protect the peace of the neighborhood; A huge dog and Mizunu-Man appear as well. Fumi is playing with her three favorite dolls. This leads Mom to search all over the house...; Bunji is on a field trip to visit the fire station. Bunji is sad that he lost rock-paper-scissors and will not be allowed to be on the hook-and-ladder truck. He ends up being oddly shown around by a high-tension fireman...; Bunji has to write an observation journal over winter break. He decides that he`s not going to tell Mom what he`s writing about. Bunji is praised for his observation journal after winter break ends. It seems he was writing about Mom... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぶんじの突撃! 友達んちの晩御飯2 / 一日かあさん / 見にいこうか / 父の背中
Bunji`s Assault! Dinner at a Friend`s Place 2 / Everyday Mom, One Day Mom / Want to go and see? / Dad`s Back
episode.summary: Bunji is invited for a hotpot dinner at the home of the four Iwamura children. Unable to be silent, the hotpot master, Dad, teaches Bunji how to be a hotpot samurai; Mom`s assistant, Ai, takes Bunji and Daichi to a Hopperman show per Mom`s request. Ai braces herself for the worst, but the boys` behavior far surpasses her expectations; Dad is out of town on business. Against the dry winter night, Mom gently asks Bunji and Fumi if they want to go see the snow; Dad is sorting war photographs for his work. Bunji walks in and offers to help. Dad is proud that he gets to show his working self to his son once in a while. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドッジボール / なんかコーフン / 予習 / お誕生会
Dodgeball / Pretty Exciting / Getting Prepared / Birthday Party
episode.summary: Dad enters the Parent/Child Ball Match Tournament on Bunji`s team. He`s casually playing around when a fast ball comes flying in. Bunji looks and sees Gonda on the opposing team! They are ready to duel to the end with their familial pride on the line. Bunji develops a bad habit where he chews on his hand while watching TV...Bunji, the "king of forgetfulness" announces he has a test tomorrow. He was able to forward a message from his teacher without forgetting it! After this, he`s ready to study hard and get a 100 on his test! Mom sees this and helps. Many of Fumi`s friends come over for her birthday party. Fumi gets upset with Kanna in a discussion about cooking. Inside of Fumi, White Fumi and Black Fumi argue... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 13-7=? / まぼろし / 鬼は外 / タッチ / お蔵だし
Hallucination / 13-7=? / Ogres Stay Outside / Touch
episode.summary: Bunji is struggling with subtraction. Determined to teach it to him today, Mom tries drawing familiar things for him...; Mom, feeling down with a cold, has Dad, Bunji, and Fumi pitch in and do the housework in her stead. She begins to feel better, after the respite. She then sees what she believes to be a surreal hallucination...; Mom and the other moms are busy preparing for Bean Throwing Day. Dad brings the children along, but everyone is dressed "out of season." The dads, unreliable as they may be, have to play the role of the ogres; Dad is acting very lazily when Mom yells to him, "You are the pillar of this family!" Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父親ゆずり / 男の教室 / 白いスカート / 名じょゆう
From His Father / Boys` Classroom / White Skirt / Famous Actress
episode.summary: Mom takes Bunji to a karate dojo. At first he is excited, saying he want "to be strong, like Hopperman!" But, he ends up dearly frightened of the energy emitted by the instructor. Bunji plays hookie from his karate lesson, but Mom catches him with his favorite chicken drumstick. Mom tries to convince him to give it another try, but Bunji is genuinely terrified and won`t listen. Fumi becomes obsessed with a white dress on display at a department store, saying she wants it so bad. She pesters Mom every day about it, and every day Mom says no, saying she will get it dirty. But then something happens...! Mom has a deadline fast approaching and cannot take time to listen to Fumi. Seeing her mom hard at work, Fumi gets near her and begins to recite a picture book... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぴにゃりくん / おねえちゃん / ハイヒール / 理系度
Pinyari / Big Sister / HIgh Heels / Science Type
episode.summary: The mysterious life-form, pinyari. It`s always going after everyone. Fumi and Bunji heard about the pinyari from Mom and low and behold, they spot one! Fumi wants a little sister. the Kamohara household is entrusted with watching over a girl. Fumi tries her hardest to take care of her but things don`t go as planned... Fumi decides she wants high-heels while out shopping. Mom, remembering her youthful desire for high-heels, reluctantly purchases them for her. But on the way home...! Lately, Bunji`s been doing odd things like stuffing bread in the VCR and crackers in the CD player. Suddenly, a spirit appears before Mom and proclaims that Bunji might be a scientific type! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 朝っぱらから / カレー / 亀レース / ホワイトデー騒動
From Morning On / Curry / Turtle Race / White Day Fuss
episode.summary: Mom will never lower her head to Grandma. So again, she has to put up with her slovenly behavior. Then one day, Mom lies to her as she leaves to go play mahjong...At the monthly PTA meeting, Mugi, the mother in a very large family, stands up and makes a proclamation. Her suggestion is received very well by the other mothers. Bunji and Daichi are racing turtles in the hallway. Dad declares, "If it`s horse racing, leave it to me!" Mom is brought in as a reluctant color commentator, and they`re off...! Bunji and Mom go to a department store to buy a return gift to give to Chinatsu on White Day. Looking to choose a gift that "tickles a woman`s feelings," Mom picks out the sweet that`s all the rage: macarons. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 禁酒 / ゆとり / 男の背中 / 写真
No Alcohol / Relax / A Guy`s Back / Photograph
episode.summary: Dad is told he cannot drink alcohol for a while upon having his wisdom teeth removed. He inches ever so close to giving into temptation, each time being reprimanded by Mom, Bunji, and Fumi. Once again, the spirit of early education appears to Mom as she worries about Bunji`s school issues. Then suddenly, the peculiar "spirit of relaxed education" appears! Taka, Mom`s friend as a little girl, appears. He looks like a run-of-the-mill businessman, but has a certain kindness to him. He accompanies him on the way to karate class, and suddenly busts into a demonstration! The mothers are having tea. It turns into a discussion about their children, and Mom goes off on a rant about hers. Dad returns and goes into a talk about the second child, e.g. Fumi... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どこから / お蔵だし / バッタマンごっこ / こどもの扉
Where did I come from? / Stored Jokes / Acting Like Hopperman / Children`s Door
episode.summary: Just a normal day in the lives of Mom, Dad, Bunji and Fumi. They all have things to do, and gather around Mom. She loved times like these. Mom tells the stories of why Bunji wore diapers for so long and why Fumi took so long to take her first steps. In fact, Mom was the reason for both of these... Bunji is acting like Hopperman and drags Mom and Dad into it. Right when they think it`s over, Bunji makes a wild proposition...! Fumi leaves food wrappers laying around. Bunji leaves the door open. It turns out the kids lose their focus when they go into the magical world through the "Children`s Door." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パーマ屋さん / ヤシの実売り / トイレザップン湖 / カンボジア大好き
Hairdresser / Selling Coconuts / Toilet Splash Lake / We Love Cambodia
episode.summary: Mom and the family head to Cambodia over spring break. Dad is supposed to meet them there, but he`s not at the designated meeting spot. The three begin to head to their destination, Angkor Wat, alone... As they walk on the road to Angkor Wat, some young boys greet them, selling coconut milk. Arriving in Angkor Wat, confused as to how to find their hotel, Dad suddenly shows up sporting a surprising look! He quickly scurries them off to show them Tonle Sap Lake. One thing about Cambodia you should know, is that children have to work very hard there. The working conditions are very poor. However, the smile on their faces is more beautiful than anywhere else. Mom and Dad both love that part of Cambodia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 4対1 / おにもつれんさ / すいぞくかん / 魚は肴
4 Vs. 1 / Drag Chain / Aquarium / Fish Are For Eating
episode.summary: Mom takes the four dummies, Bunji, Ma, Chi, and Daichi to the aquarium. Mom asks them to calm down on the train ride there, but they won`t listen...The four finally arrive and exit the train. They just need to board the bus. However, one leaves to go to the bathroom and another disappears. This continues so they cannot get mving...Mom finally feels at ease, seeing the boys enjoying the aquarium. Eventually she dozes off. Thinking it`s so loud, she wakes up to see...! Just when they`re ready to leave, they see the souvenior corner. Mom tastes a side dish for sake while the kids make noise... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 学校への道 / 給食 / まずいラーメン屋 / ぴーぴーあな
The Path to School / School Lunch / Noodle Shop of Horrors / Peepy Hole
episode.summary: Bunji dropped all his school belongings on the roadway leading to school, but the kindhearted Chinatsu brought them to him. Mom, suspicious, secretly follows Bunji to school... Only those who finish their lunches fast in Bunji`s class can have seconds. Because Daichi is out today, his pudding remains. The speed-eating battle for the pudding begins! Dad says he wants to go get ramen noodles in the middle of the night. Bunji goes along with him to his favorite noodle shop, but it`s closed. They decide to go find a new place! Mom and Fumi go to the park on a day off. In the warm spring sunshine, they casually waste the day away listening to sparrows going "peep". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ちまき騒動 / うちゅうのほうかい / 春とドロドロ / おたまレスキュー隊
Chimaki Riot / The Collapse of the Universe / Spring and Muddy / Tadpole Rescue Team
episode.summary: Bunji takes the entire class`s supply of chimaki peels home after lunch. Ma follows, along with others. Mom watches over them as they plot to do something with the chimaki peels... Bunji is eating a ghost-shrimp lunch set. Without thinking about the amount, he dumps all the eggs into the water tank. Out pours a red tide, followed by a harrowing sight... Mom and the gang go on a parent-child picnic on a beautiful spring afternoon. The mothers moan and complain as the kids get all messy from playing in the sandpit, but in truth Mom isn`t as upset as she pretends to be. Bunji gets better at tadpole rescuing every year. He`s surpassed 300 tadpoles this year. When deciding whether or not to throw them away or use as bait, Bunji, Ma and the others form the tadpole rescue team... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お泊まり会 / 父のうどん あらため, 母のすいとん / つめ放題 / 好き
Sleepover / Dad`s Udon... Nope, Mom`s Suiton / Stuffing As Much As You Can / Like
episode.summary: Bunji, Ma, Chi, and Daichi are having a sleepover party tonight. Mom prepares for all contingencies, but the four of them go into crazy mode right at the start! Dad always invites the family out for noodles, but no one wants to go today. Reluctantly, they go anyway. On the way they find a tool to make udon with. Surprisingly, Bunji and Fumi get real into it! Mrs. Gonda takes Mom to the supermarket. In a race to beat the clock on a limited time sale, they go into super battle mode, employing the wits of the housewives... Fumi gets over a cold and returns to kindergarten. Upon her return, she is surrounded by the boys of the class: The good-looking Masa, the somewhat bad guy, Takashi, Joe with the scissors, and others... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うんどうかい / にげろ! / 目でころす / はしれはしれ!
Sports Festival / Run Away! / Evil Eyes / Run Run!
episode.summary: Bunji, Ma, Chi, Daichi, and Kenta, the five idiots, focus on training for the following day`s athletic meet. They mean no ill will, but the group keeps acting as one... The Kamohara household is super excited the night before the athletic meet, because Bunji was told he has been chosen for the relay race. The truth is he was chosen by random lottery, but they`re so excited he can`t bring himself to say... The morning of the meet. Dad, being a professional cameraman, stands by at the gate to get the best possible vantage point. The rival fathers coerce him, however. Ball throwing, ball rolling, and lunchtime all pass. It is finally time for the relay race. Bunji has butterflies in his stomach when Ma shows up to cheer him on. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ザリガニ / 父の純心 / 宇宙飛行士 / 宇宙飛行士になる
Crawfish / Dad`s Pure Heart / Astronaut / To Be An Astronaut
Zarigani / Chichi no Jun Kokoro / Uchuuhikoushi / Uchuuhikoushi ni Naru
episode.summary: Bunji and Daichi are out fishing for crawfish and loving it. They are using smoked squid for bait, but the giant blue crawfish doesn`t take to it. They wonder why and then... Fumi and Dad go to a department to shop for clothes. They go into a "gal" event and Fumi gets into a conversation. Dad is quickly left out. Bunji says he wants to be an astronaut. Dad, completely drunk, grabs a swimming ring and goggles and says he`ll train him to become one. Bunji goes with his class to a space museum. Bunji spouts off the suspect info regarding space he learned from Dad and his classmates make fun of him. But the astronaut goes to Bunji and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 初恋..., ふみ / 初恋..., ぶんじ / おたまぴょん / 夫婦愛
First Love... Fumi / First Love... Bunji / Tadpoles Hopping / Couple Love
episode.summary: Fumi and Dad go to a parent & child cooking class. Fumi is upset, saying she wished Mom was there, when she becomes enchanted by a kind college student. She is completely infatuated and when Mom sees this... During a parent-child day of picking up trash at the park, Bunji plays with Ma and doesn`t pick up trash at all. Along the way, he becomes enchanted by a kind high school girl. He is completely infatuated, but... Bunji is playing with tadpoles. Suddenly the tadpole Bunji has starts to grow. But he doesn`t eat anything and Bunji gets worried... Mom and Dad get into a fight over something trivial. Mom ignores everything Dad says and doesn`t respond to his questions. He realizes that he is helpless without Mom while in the house... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説のカリー / ばあちゃんの恋 / 歯がぬけた / 二人でおつかい
The Legendary Curry / Grandma`s Love / Tooth Came Out / Two Going Shopping
episode.summary: One day, Dad says he wants to make the legendary Kamo curry. He had it once in India, long ago, and sets off on a gastronomical journey to relive the experience. Bunji is acting really down. He has a tooth that is about to fall out, but he mistakes it for being sick. Mom tries to explain to him that it only hurts until it falls out and then it feels better, but... "I... fell in love." Grandma is obsessed with the mature Korean TV star, Yong-sama. She tells Mom she wants her to buy her the DVDs of a Korean drama that Yong-sama stars in... Bunji and Fumi go shopping by themselves for the first time, with Mom`s permission. Since she said they can buy whatever they want with their allowance, they skip off merrily to the supermarket. However... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 朝ごはん / サッカーさま / 父の日..., って? / 雨の日
Breakfast / Soccer / Father`s Day... What Happened? / Rainy Days
episode.summary: The Kamohara family dog, Jon. He came with a great pedigree but, because Mom`s motto is "Dogs belong outside," he has endured a tough life. Today will we find out what Jon`s true motives are?! Dad returns from overseas with soccer fever. He monopolizes the TV and tries to force everyone to watch a soccer match. Dad is acting exceptionally strange today, because tomorrow is Father`s Day. He is trying to be the model father because his kids are to be writing him "Thank you, Dad" cards. It is pouring outside. Unable to study, the family reminisces of their younger days while the rain pours outside. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バザー / 職人技 / つわもの / 打ち上げ
Bazaar / Vendor Technique / Strong Person / Launch
episode.summary: Mom is tasked with running the games at the kindergarten bazaar. The previous day Mom ignored her work to slave over making some game character cosplay outfits. The kids run in, delighted, and Mom is satisfied. At the bazaar, Chi`s mother joins in selling frankfurters. She sighs as she is tasked with a quota of selling 1500 in one day. Dad rushes in right before the end of the bazaar to capitalize on the discounts. Mom wants him to buy some silverware but for whatever reason he doesn`t act as the prices plummet. The bazaar ends. The boss, Kenta, Ma`s mother, who worked the games, and Chi`s mother who cooked the frankfurters all celebrate a successful day of sales. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いけいけブンジマン4 / 白か黒か / 仲直り / スランプかあさん
Go Go Bunji Man 4 / White or Black / Made Up / Slump Mom
episode.summary: Bunji Man is energetic even in the rain because of his "Aqua Form," created from a garbage bag or supermarket bag. With this, one can freely play, even in the rain; Mom and Fumi are shopping in Ginza. Unexpectedly, in the children`s clothes section of the department store, they run into Fumi`s rival, Kanna, and her mom. As they are trying on clothes, the girls compete and Black Fumi and White Fumi appear; Fumi is frowning while they are having tea in the department store cafe with Kanna and her mom. Even here, a fierce battle over the menu begins between White Fumi and Black Fumi; Mom has finally finished work. Or so she thinks when another deadline appears. Her brush doesn`t make any progress, as the only thing that does progress is time as she sleeps, plays, or just spaces out. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サファリパーク / とうさんVS沖田くん / 兄と妹 / 帰り道
Safari Park / Dad Vs. Mr. Okita / Brother and Sister / Going Home
episode.summary: After seeing it on TV, the Kamohara family goes to a safari park. However, Dad says, "A safari park is not a zoo! It`s a savanna where survival of the fittest reigns!"; Having arrived at the safari park, the Kamohara family boards the animal bus to take them around the park. Seeing the guide, Okita, has fully captured the children`s hearts, a sense of rivalry burns within Dad; Bunji and Fumi head to the petting area alone. Like an older brother, Bunji tries to look after his little sister, but a little misunderstanding blows up and things get unpleasant; On the way home, Mom gets irritated after they get caught up in a large traffic jam. She notices that Bunji, Fumi, and even Dad need to go to the bathroom. They manage to make it to a service area at the last minute but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大地くんちでお勉強 / もってかえれ / 停電 / まだ停電
Studying at Daichi`s Place / Take It Home / Blackout / Blackout Again
episode.summary: Kenta, Daichi, and Bunji are studying at Daichi`s house. Kenta is usually so cocky, but his whole expression changes when he sees Daichi`s turtle. Bunji has never really brought home anything he`s built or drew in school. Mom thinks she should save them as precious memories of his youth. But then one day... Mom is rushing to finish a chapter before her deadline when the power suddenly goes out! Dad finds a flashlight but can`t find any batteries. Mom just gives up... Thanks to a little help, Mom finishes her work. Though she is supposed to cook the next meal, Dad, being no stranger to the outdoors, starts prepping for a barbecue... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: こどもの世界 / はるかなる山のおたけび / 家族大作戦 / 夫婦の会話
Kids` World / Crying Out Loud On Top of a Faraway Mountain / Big Family Operation / Couple`s Conversation
episode.summary: In Bunji`s group of friends who usually get along, Ma and Chi are having a rare fight. Bunji is perplexed as he is caught between two people who refuse to talk to each other; Having a dream of downing a cold beer at the restaurant on the summit of a mountain, Mom has come with the family to summit a mountain. But with the cable car not moving, they decide to actually climb up the mountain...; Mom and the family decide to go to a BBQ place for dinner. They are each going to do their own thing until it`s time to meet and then meet at the restaurant, but...; You can`t tell if Dad is listening to Mom`s daily gossiping or complaining about trivial things. But Mom shows no interest when Dad is into what happened in the baseball game... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テストのヤマ / せいれいさん / 姫のこころ / もったいない君
Mountain Test / Spirits x3 / A Princess`s Heart / Not Wasteful Boy
episode.summary: Bunji`s class has a short kanji test tomorrow, but Bunji can`t remember the kanji. Mom has a plan to predict which kanji will likely be on the test, but...; Mom is disappointed by Bunji`s test results today too when the three Spirits of Eduction appear. The three spirits don`t get along and somehow, a competition between them begins; Mom gives Fumi a Marie Antoinette DVD as a reward for helping out. Fumi is really excited, but as she watches, she unexpectedly understands how easily a woman`s heart changes; Bunji hated sleeping since nursery school. His reasoning is "That`s because it`s a waste of a day going away." As Mom tries to find a way to put him to sleep, Bunji is... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おちた / 動物 / まえがみ / 夏の知らせ
Fell Out / Animals / Bangs / Summer Notice
episode.summary: The plan to predict the test questions is unable to produce success and Bunji`s kanji test ends in total defeat. Mom studies with Bunji as she sets a low goal of "a least get a 20 out of a 100," but...; Mom has come to a hotel buffet with Daichi`s family and Chinatsu`s family. Chinatsu`s mom is very easygoing toward the high spirited Bunji and Daichi who are rampaging about, but...; Mom has inadvertently cut Fumi`s bangs too short. Fumi is in a horrible mood and is still unhappy the next day when she is being taken to nursery school. However, accidentally, Mom makes Fumi even angrier...; Bunji has caught a summer cold. The day after, when he`s supposed to take a day off, he heads to school with a runny nose and when he returns, he say he wants to go to the pool. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 親子ゲンカ / 蚊 / 娘の要求 / 机の中
Parent and Child Quarrel / Mosquito / Daughter`s Request / Inside the Deck
episode.summary: Mom is exhausted after pulling an all-nighter, so she goes to have a beer... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: こそこそ / 夏休み / 海辺の教育 / 海賊船
Sneaky / Summer Vacation / Education at the Beach / Pirate Ship
episode.summary: Bunji is acting strange... He clutches a 100 yen coin and paces nervously outside of supermarkets and convenience stores... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖の合宿 / ぐへー / 甘いぞ / ぶんぶん
Scary Training Camp / Yum / You Are Too Relaxed / Wave, wave
episode.summary: Bunji has to spend the night at his karate dojo. He is bullied on top of the harsh training. Source: crunchyroll

Muay Thai Boys / Horseshow Crab / Railroad Mom / Bunji`s Wife

Watch Out on Top of Your Head / Nuta Talk / Supervisor Ai / Parent and Child Stupid Couple
episode.summary: UFOs, Nuta, and Thumbelina all make appearances in this episode of Kaasan - Mom`s Life! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 映画館 / お仲間 / 5馬鹿 / いつまでも
Movie Theater / Stupid x4 Friends / 5 Stupid Boys / Forever
episode.summary: A trip to the movies and the beach has Bunji feeling extra wild. How will Mom handle his energy? Source: crunchyroll
