Scary Night / Sending Attachment by Cell Phone... / Experiment / Portrait
episode.summary: New Year`s, Homeostasis, turtles, stone statues... What do they have in common? Watch and find out. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女の子パワー / スナックかあさん / 続スナックかあさん / ゲージツの秋
Girl Power / Snack Moms / Snack Moms Continued / Artistic Autumn
episode.summary: Chinatsu and Koharu have come to drop off schoolwork with Bunji, who stayed home with a cold. However, Bunji went out to play when Mom wasn`t looking and the two girls are left to wait in the livingroom...; Saturday night, after putting the family to sleep, the usual group of moms gather at Mom`s house with leftovers in hand. This is the "Snack Moms."; Things are very lively with the Snack Moms. Nagasaki has finally come late, and it becomes a huge party after Dad, Bunji, Fumi, and Grandma join in after they are woken by the noise; On the day of the class drawing event, Bunji and the others have no interest in drawing and are restless, being unable to focus. In all this, Daichi is completely focused on drawing a crane that sits on an empty plot of land. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女子部ダイエット / 女子トーク / 棒 / 石
Women`s Diet / Girl Talk / Sticks / Rocks
episode.summary: Mom decides she has to lose weight. Will she have good luck on her diet? Somehow one doubts it`ll be so easy... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かきあげ / むぎ式ダイエット / 母のウソ / おなかの中身
Shrimp and Vegetable Fritters / Mugi Style Diet / Mom`s Lies / Mom`s Insides
episode.summary: Mugi diets, sakura shrimp, and a motto to die by... All on this week`s episode of Kaasan - Mom`s Life. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ちょいワル / できる男 / ぷりぷり / 遺伝
Tough Guy / A Man Who Can Do It / Poke Poke / Genes
episode.summary: Taiga is a 6th grade tough guy who the neighborhood elementary students adore. Bunji is completely into him too. After Bunji comes home from playing with Taiga, he speaks and acts like a tough guy. The spirit of relaxed education appears before Mom, who is shouting at Bunji again today. Truth is Bunji can do it and there is a trump card to further motivate him except... Every mom has their own secret attachment to their children. Mom loves the springy feeling of Fumi`s stomach and butt, and melts when touching her. Mom and Fumi argue over overcooking ingredients. Bunji jumps in and intervenes while dancing pantless. His appearance really resembles Dad... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぴにゃりくんの逆襲 / こどものカゼ / おとなのカゼ / ケッコンの条件
Pinyari`s Counterattack / Children`s Colds / Adults` Colds / Requirements For Your Marriage Partner
episode.summary: Bunji was about to have a riceball for lunch when it tumbled away. He chased it and entered a hole. Inside he found... another world with a group of pinyari festively dancing?! Dad is away on work and Grandma is away on the trip leaving only Mom, Bunji, and Fumi at home. One morning, Bunji and Fumi have caught colds. Mom gives it everything to care for them and do her work, but... Mom is completely exhausted with a cold and is struggling to work. Dad is unwell and bedridden. Grandma is tired from her travels. Bunji and Fumi are truly enjoying the situation... A cool-looking pastry chef in a newly opened cake shop has Fumi in a complete daze. Her friends are very excited hearing "I have decided to marry him!" Now to confess to him! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女の友情 / おしゃべり / お風呂 / おこりんぼかあさん
Women`s Friendship / Talk Time / Bath / Short-Tempered Mom
episode.summary: Mom and Fumi are on their way home from having lunch near the train station when Fumi`s stomach starts to hurt. Telling her to hold it until they get home, Mom talks about her childhood experience of urgently needing a toilet. While watching "Cinderella", Bunji hits Fumi with simple questions. Fumi`s answers are curt. Unconvinced, Bunji extends the topic to a picture book of "Momotaro"... Bunji says he will take his bath by himself. Thinking that maybe he is growing up a little, Mom is impressed, but it seems he isn`t warming himself properly. Wondering why, she peeks into the bath one day... Having rushed out to bring in the laundry after a sudden shower, Mom blows her top at Dad, Bunji, and Fumi when they won`t help her at all. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぐるぐる / おやこ / 気持ちはわかる / メロン
Round and Round / Child and Parent / Understand Your Feelings / Melon
episode.summary: Mom goes with Bunji to the park where Bunji often sees his friends. However, they mysteriously and repeatedly greet each other with "Yo", only to walk around the park and greet each other again...; Dad and Grandma are alone in the house. Dad somehow feels uncomfortable while trying very hard to be mindful, but he can`t last around Grandma; Dad and Grandma are alone in the house. Dad somehow feels uncomfortable while trying very hard to be mindful, but he can`t last around Grandma; The good looking Masa and the tough guy Takashi are Fumi`s classmates. Which one of them is a suitable match...? Both of them have their good points... White Fumi and Black Fumi have a heated debate inside of a conflicted Fumi`s head. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おみあい / およばれ / ブーム / 秋の空
Arranged Marriage / Invited Over / Trend / Autumn Sky
episode.summary: Mom`s assistant, Ai, is having a marriage interview with a good looking, high salaried elite. Mom and the others are super excited and Ai declares she has finally won at life. However... Bunji is invited to Chinatsu`s house for dinner. He was lectured by Chinatsu on everything from the gift to bring to how to use a knife and fork, but things don`t go right... Bunji comes home making puns left and right as puns have become the popular thing at school. As they come to him, he tries one pun after another on Mom and Ai. In the end, he`s even trying them on Mr. Mizunuma. As autumn becomes winter, Mom remembers about when she was young and moving to the city. She had huge hopes, but her worries were even larger. At that time, Mom loved to visit the zoo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふりーだむ / おそうしき / 兄嫁 / ただいま
Freedom / Funeral / Sister-in-Law / I`m Back
episode.summary: Mom and Grandma need to go to Kochi on urgent business. Dad, Bunji and Fumi are left at home and, with Dad`s "Freedom Declaration", enjoy their freedom to the fullest... Mom and Grandma`s urgent business was a relative`s funeral. The funeral is for the husband of a cousin who Mom hadn`t seen in a long time. Funerals in the country side are lively, as people laugh and cry as they reminisce together... While being taken to the airport by Mom`s brother and his wife, Mom is shocked by the stories about incredible hardships surrounding childbirth from her normally quiet and ladylike sister-in-law. Bunji and Fumi are enjoying their "Freedom", but the loneliness from Mom being gone worsens... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かっこようて / コッセツ / まんが家ぶんじ / ひそひそ
Broken Bone / Stylish / Manga Artist Bunji / Whisper Whisper
episode.summary: Having broken his arm, Bunji goes to school wearing a cast. "What`s that?" "So hard!" "So awesome!" marvel his classmates. Bunji is delighted as he instantly becomes Mr. Popular, but he gets carried away... Mom and the kids have come to a model home with Mrs. Morita and her son. While Mrs. Morita is completely entranced by this perfect dream home with a wooden terrace and vaulted ceilings, Mom calmly tells her... Bunji suddenly says that he wants to be a manga artist. He is completely into it as he sets up a small desk next to Mom`s work desk and has Daichi in the role of the assistant. This is a story from when Mom was small. In the early evening, when she was playing in the fields, her mom would call for her, "Dinner Time!" Today`s dinner is Mom`s favorite fried noodles. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一日一善 / 消えたぶんじたち / キラケシ / ふみ, ギャルになる
A Good Deed a Day is Now a Bowl of Noodles a Day / Missing Bunji and the Rest / Sparkly `Raser / Fumi`s Going to be a Mallrat?
episode.summary: Dad suddenly declares "I will be Lord Buddha`s servant and do a good deed a day!" However, he misses his chance to give his seat to an old man on the bus and is mistaken as a kidnapper after reaching out to a lost child at the supermarket... Chi is brought to tears by some upperclassmen. He says he saw a store near "Shibuya" selling the popular "Sparkly `raser", but they won`t believe him. Bunji and the rest set out to prove that Chi doesn`t lie. The mothers are worried about their children as night has fallen and they have not come home. Meanwhile, Bunji and the others have finally made it to the location of the Sparkly `raser they sought, but... While shopping, Mom has no idea what the gals are saying and Fumi explains. Mom is listening interestedly, but she suddenly sees Fumi`s aspiring gaze at the gals! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 食虫植物 / 公園デビュー / さむ~い / サンタさんにお願い
Carnivorous Plant / Debut in a Park / It`s Cold / Writing Wishes to Santa
episode.summary: Bunji has bought a Sarracenia, a carnivorous plant. Trying to catch live insects for food, he places a trap in the house and runs around with an insect net, but it doesn`t quite work out. Dad has brought Bunji and Fumi to the park. While he keeps an eye on the children as they play freely, he suddenly notices that he`s being eyed with suspicion by the other moms. The heater has broken down and Mom can`t work because her hand is too cold. A hot water bottle that she found in the closet was taken by Grandma. Along with Bunji and Fumi, they try various tricks, but they can`t shake the cold... Fumi is writing what she wants for a christmas present to Santa Claus. She obsessively lists what she wants, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 舞族 / 弁当選手権 / レッツ, ディスカッション! / 家出少女ふみ
Dance Family / Veteran Lunch Box Makers / Let`s Discuss! / Runaway Girl Fumi
episode.summary: When waiting to checkout at the supermarket or when waiting for a walk signal, Mom suddenly notices that Bunji is dancing. One day, the other boys come over to do homework, and next thing she knows, everyone is dancing. What is going on?; The other moms have gathered at Mom`s house late at night again. The "Snack Moms" is in full swing. Today`s discussion topic is a showdown over cutting corners when making lunch, the "Veteran Lunch Makers Competition."; In a rare instance, Bunji is enthusiastically studying at home. Mom peeks and sees him studying a subject newly introduced into compulsory education, International Studies, an English class. Mom is a little impressed when the 3 spirits appear before her;It`s evening and Fumi is alone, swinging on the swing at the park. She had a fight with Mom and ran out of the house. A kindly girl with a shopping bag happens upon her... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 麦家のなぞ / ドレス / ドリルやれドリル / ラーメンの歳月
Mugi Family Mystery / Dress / Do the Drills, Do It / Noodle Time
episode.summary: Mysterious events are occurring around the eldest son of Mugi`s five boys. When he gets home and goes to do his homework, his textbooks have been torn up. His belongings such as his shoes and writing implements are going missing. Who is behind this?; Fumi is completely delusional after seeing a bride when passing by a wedding hall. She follows the bride all the way to the reception hall, but on the way, the wedding dress showroom grabs her attention; A pile of tests with awful grades are found deep in Bunji`s desk drawer. Mom gets mad that he can`t even hide them properly and decrees that he can`t play with this friends until he finishes all his drills...; Mom is on a stroll with Bunji and Fumi one afternoon when she happens across the ramen shop she and Dad went to back when they were getting to know each other. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小姑 / 熟睡中 / 尊敬 / 同志
Sister / In the Middle of Action, In the Middle of Deep Sleep / Respect / Comrades
episode.summary: Lately Fumi has been really harsh with Bunji. When he doesn`t clean up when he`s done playing and when he leaves his clothes strewn about after taking them off, Fumi nags and lectures him. The other moms have gathered at Mom`s house late at night again. The "Snack Moms" is in full swing. Tonight`s discussion topic is about their children running out of energy. No matter whose child it is, at a certain point, they will fall asleep in an instant regardless of where they are. Mom`s distant relative Ta has come from the countryside to visit. With his arm and leg in a cast and on crutches, this 20 year old is going all out playing with Bunji and he further injures himself doing so. Bunji gazes at him with his pupils sparkling... Mom bought a plastic model for Bunji and his friends. They seem to be having fun while struggling to build their first plastic model, but next thing she knows, it has become something entirely different... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 犬も歩けば / 寒稽古 / とうさんのカメラ / 笑顔
Dogs Can Walk Too / Mid-Winter Training / Dad`s Camera / Smile
episode.summary: When Bunji hears "Dogs rank themselves and the people around them," he instantly tries to act superior to Jon and triumphantly takes him out for a walk. However... Bunji has mid-winter training with his karate dojo on the riverbed with a fierce winter wind blowing. With the rule being whoever says "It`s cold" gets penalized, the trio tries to mess with Bunji as usual. Dad is doing maintenance on his camera that he uses for work. He takes pictures of Bunji and Fumi when they run in, but since they are only familiar with digital cameras and cellphone photos, they think they can see the pictures right away... The most common images that Dad has taken are ones that show the smiles of children, like a flower in bloom, in the ruins of battle or in rubble. No matter how terrible the situation, when you point the camera at them, the children will smile. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 入れ食い / カニへの道 / 露天風呂 / 冬の動物園
Biting at Every Cast / The Path to Crabs / Open Air Hot Spring / Winter Zoo
episode.summary: Mom and the gang have come to Dad`s birthplace, Hokkaido. They immediately head for the market to search for crabs, but lured by Dad, they end up fishing for crabs in Hakodate Bay. The gang is now in Sapporo. Mom is irritated because she is unable to obtain the crab she desires, but Dad and the kids say they want to eat Sapporo ramen. The gang heads for Asahikawa, but venture forth by regular train instead of taking the express train. About when they get bored of the beautiful snowscape extending as far as they can see, the train stops for snow removal. Mom and the gang have come to the Asahimori Zoo. Watching Bunji and Fumi happily play with the penguins and seals, Mom and Dad are sincerely glad to have brought them to Hokkaido. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: しんだふり / フランソワ / スキー / でっかいどう
Pretend to be Dead / Francois / Ski / Huge
episode.summary: Mom and the family are going north in a rental car. They take a break to play in the snow, but suddenly catch sight of the figure of a furry animal. Next to them is a "Watch out for Bears" sign. They panic and return to the car, but it`s not starting and won`t move...; Mom and the family are at the home of the owner of the St. Bernard, Mr. Furusawa. Dad says that every house in Hokkaido is guaranteed to have a bear in it...; Mom and the gang have gone skiing. Bunji gets really good in a short time, but he gets over confident, goes off on his own, and falls off a cliff, getting separated from everyone; As they approach the end of an enjoyable trip, they arrive at Cape Soya. If you weigh yourself there, you will find you weigh far more than in Tokyo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アソちゃん / ふたりの秘密 / 兄, きたる! / 赤トンボ
Aso / Two Children`s Secrets / Brother Arrived! / Red Dragonfly
episode.summary: There is a scribble on the back of Bunji`s backpack. It`s actually a picture of Aso, Bunji`s imaginary friend; Bunji is invited to Chi`s house for dinner. He`s amazed by the collection of figures and such lining Chi`s room, but the atmosphere turns bad when he`s told "Don`t Touch!"; Mom`s brother from Kochi has come to visit Tokyo. Mom is busy, so Dad takes him out drinking. However, without Mom, the two don`t know what to talk about...;When Mom was a child, she hated the red dragonflies that would fly at the end of summer and the beginning of the new semester. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 赤ずきんちゃん / からあげ / あいあいがさ / 0点記念
Red Riding Hood / Deep-Fried Chicken / Umbrella of Love / Celebrate
Akazukin-chan / Karaage / Aiaigasa / 0-ten Kinen
episode.summary: #1 Today is a story everyone knows: "Little Red Riding Hood." However, for some reason Mom has the role of Red Riding Hood and Fumi is playing the mother. #2 Fumi has come over to Kanna`s house and Kanna`s mom`s homemade scones have her in a daze. She pesters Mom, "Next time, we should have fantastic homemade snacks too," but... #3 Bunji arrives at school to find that Chinatsu`s and his names are scribbled on the blackboard, sharing an umbrella. Being surrounded by jeers of "Married! Married!" Bunji becomes overly conscious of Chinatsu and becomes unable to speak to her. #4 Bunji has gotten a 0 on his test. Mom treats Bunji to a deluxe icecream figuring, "It`s a rare thing so we might as well celebrate it!" As she watches Bunji happily eat, she recalls memories of days long past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 帰る時間 / 世話チョコ / カツカレー / おかえりなさい隊
Time to Come Back / Obligated Chocolate / Katsu Curry / Welcome Back Troop
episode.summary: # 1 Bunji ran away from home after arguing with Mom. With nowhere for him to go, his friends, who knew what happened, made a secret base together. They can just live in there! That`s the story. #2 On the morning of Valentine`s Day, Mom`s deadline is closing in. Mr. Mizunuma lends a hand to wrap Fumi`s chocolate and keeps her company to give them out, but... #3 The whole family comes down with a fever. They want to have something that`s refreshing, but... That`s what they thought, but what Dad ordered for takeout is garlic pork ribs with thick noodles and... #4 Mom comes back home late because of work. Mom goes into a dark room and turns the light on… What greets her is a troop of dolls and stuffed toys that Bunji placed there with a note that says welcome back... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キューピッドの矢 / だれ...? / からいっ! / 路上の天才
Cupid`s Arrow / Who...? / Hot! / Genius on the Road
episode.summary: #1 Mom`s Assistant, Ai, has coincidentally met a cool-looking man and fallen in love straight away. Not only that, she has met him twice and thought that it was a fateful encounter... #2 One day, Dad wakes up at home with just his pants on. He has a huge bump on his forehead. It looks like the night before he had too much to drink. But he doesn`t remember what happened at all. When he tries to recall his faint memory... #3 At a friendship party, Bunji and his friends didn`t bother to peel carrots as usual, put the whole lot of potatoes in, and their moms start to get worried. While glancing the other way, a girl in the same class gets scolded for... #4 On the road right in front of Mom`s house, there is a child that is wiggling like a caterpillar. He is Fumi`s classmate, when he plays the game rock-paper-scissors, he only uses scissors… In short, he’s “Scissors Jo.” The next day, he walks down the road with cardboard around him to be a cardboard robot. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コンカツ / 育つな / ドレスの下は / デート
Marriage Hunting / Don`t Grow Up / What`s Under the Dress Is... / Date
episode.summary: Marriage Hunting: While waiting for Mom to finish her document, Mr. Mizunuma was grinning. When asked, he said that he`s going to a marriage hunting party. But Fumi crushes Mr. Mizunuma`s philosophy of love one by one...; Don`t grow up: Dad`s distant relative, Tak has come after a long time. Tak had a strong image of being a boy playing in the fields but when he arrived, he really did look like an otaku...; Under the dress: Fumi forced herself to come to Mom`s friend wedding ceremony. To Fumi, a wedding ceremony is a place where there`s a lot of princess - a place where Fumi can only dream of.; Date: Everyone is supposed to eat out together but Mom and Dad are left out by their own. After being told to go on a date in a couple, they went to a fanciful Italian restaurant but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ここから先が / ケンカ / ジョンとかあさん / 寝る
From This Point On / Fight / Jon and Mom / Sleep
episode.summary: 1. Fumi and friends are completely into Cinderella on TV. Mom blurts out about things starting to go downhill. Hearing that they… 2. Bunji and co are at a group study session at Gonda’s house. They start making a ton of noise which causes Gonda’s mom to run in. With the fear of being thumped by Gonda’s Mom; Bunji and co discover the weakness... 3. Mom is stuck at home after failing to finish her work. She lets Jon into the house and has to feed, walk, and spend time with him but… 4. Bunji has recently been falling asleep anywhere and anytime: during karate practice, washing his hands, and at meals. One Sunday, mom leaves him alone and lets him sleep… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ビヨンセ / 麦マイナス1 / ボルシチ / お蔵出し
Beyonce / Mugi Minus One / Borsch / Warehouse of Jokes
episode.summary: Beyoncé: Fumi has recently been engrossed with world superstar Beyoncé. She imitates Beyoncé, shows off her belly button, does Monroe walk - she starts to act like her. One day...; Mugi minus 1: The familiar five boys - the Mugi family. But for some reason today, there`s one less! It looks like he ran away from home. While Bunji is out doing groceries, he coincedentally meets with the third Mugi boy. (3rd boy in family); Borsch (Ukraine dish): When Mom comes back late from work, Dad decides to cook dinner. What`s on the menu is borsch. There was a time when Dad was in Siberia and he ate it with his body freezing - it was something that is out of the world. That is what he`s trying to reproduce. ; What`s in the warehouse (part of mom`s jokes): Mom`s funny story. Bunji happens to be in a fish and rice shop. (NOT fish and chips). Bunji has an interesting way of eating his favorite ramen but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぴにゃりとうさん / 男のコ女のコ / おかあさんの必殺技 / とうさんVSかあさん
Pinyari Dad / Boy, Girl / Special Move / Dad vs. Mom
episode.summary: Pinyari Dad This is the Pinyari family. Dad, Mom, son and daughter - the four of them live together in this house. Today, they fight over meal time - that is their usual way of family gathering. At that time, a big monster has appeared! Boy and Girl On a rest day, Mom took Bunji and Fumi to a department store to buy clothes. But Bunji didn`t really care in choosing his clothes and gets excited in the toy store. Mom`s special move Bunji and his friends get engrossed with their card games. They decided to make their own Moms on cards. Mom`s element is thunder, her special move is "Nagging Falling Thunder" and so on. Dad vs Mom Dad and Mom are quarreling. Mom swears that she has never made a mistake and to counter that, Dad prepares a specific example but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ホント / うそうそ / オヤジのたしなみ / 雨の日の笑顔
True / Lies / Older Man`s Modesty / The Smile on a Rainy Day
episode.summary: Snack Moms is going on today. Today`s theme is "it sounds unbelievable but it`s true". The moms start to stories about their children that seem really unbelievable but are true, and when it kept going...; Recently Bunji has started to selfishly tell lies. When Mom asks him why, he says it`s fun. At first, Mom was fed up with him, but eventually she got angry...; By coincidence, the two of them, Dad and Ai, Mom`s assistant, were left at home. While Ai was busy working, Dad goes to extremes to try and provide service to her; Fumi said that she will make Mommy`s lunch. When Mom looks at her cooking as well as preparing, Mom senses her growing, and while Mom is really happy with that... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ちいさいみどりのおじさん / プロデュース / ボタン / スナックとうさん
Small Green Man / Producer / Buttons / Snack Dad
episode.summary: Small green uncle One of the cards from Bunji`s collection has gone missing. Puzzled over what is going on, he asks his friends. There is a rumor going on that a "small green uncle" is doing it. That`s the story... Produce Mom peeked at Fumi`s nursery school. During art class, Fumi doesn`t make anything. Mom thinks it`s strange, and when she finally finds Fumi, around her is a group of boys busy making art and... Button Bunji just wants to keep on pressing buttons. The other day he pressed the call button on the ticket counter and caused trouble for the ticket agent. When Moms talks about this dilemma to Dad... Snack Dad This is not the usual "Snack Moms" but "Snack Dad" instead. A night when the family goes to bed, a bartender Dad acts like he`s working in a bar and Bunji walks into the place. It is a secret place where the two of them grumble about Mom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なりきりふみ / チームワーク / とうさん改造 / みじかい
Fashion Model Acting Fumi / Acting Bunji Teamwork / Reformed Dad / Short
episode.summary: 1. Acting Fumi Mom and the gang have come to a theme park where the children learn about society and are challenged to do the jobs that they like. Fumi and Kanna are challenged to become fashion models, but... 2. Acting Bunji The four silly boys, Bunji and his friends, take on the challenge of the fire brigade. After getting instructions that teamwork is important, they are off! As soon as that happens, Chi can`t get off the pole... 3. Reformed Dad While Fumi and Dad are walking Jon, they meet with Kanna`s cool-looking dad in a suit. When Fumi sees that, she tells Daddy to wear something more decent, but... 4. Short Bunji doesn`t quite like giving opinions for his reading homework. Maybe the book is too hard, and so Bunji goes on writing his opinion on poetry, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぴにゃり333 / ぶり屋さん / とうさんの出番 / アソちゃんとぼく
Pinyari 333 / Yellowtail Vendor / Dad`s Turn / Aso and Me
episode.summary: The Pinyari are in the middle of work, using pickaxes to dig in a mine. All of a sudden, there is a cave in! What will be the fate of the three hundred and thirty three pinyari who got trapped underground?; Fumi has to act as a yellowtail vendor in her nursery school play. Boasting that she can`t lose to Angelina Jolie, she starts practicing; The Kamohara TV seems to be broken. When Dad looks at it, the remote control switch was just in the wrong mode. "Leave it to me when something like that happens!" Dad seems to be very happy. One day...; Stepping on the back of a shoe caused Bunji to argue with his best friends, Ma, Chi and Daichi, and made things difficult. Aso, Bunji`s imaginary friend appears and talks to him, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フリマ / フリフリママ / かあさんの逆襲 / とうさんの休日
Flea Market / Dancing Mom / Mom`s Counterattack / Dad`s Day Off
episode.summary: Flea Market Bunji and Fumi are learning how to sell at the flea market. Bunji displays his lack of talent in math and Fumi shows her mom how to work over a customer. Dancing Mom Mom has finally sold a doll she considered cursed, but the doll will have the last laugh. Mom`s Counterattack Mom can`t understand Bunji`s reading homework, suddenly the spirit of early education is back and he and mom are locked in a battle of trivia. Dad`s Day Off. Today Dad is trying to relaxing, but it seems the world is plotting against him. Will he be able to get any rest? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おっぱい / セレブ? / スーパーとうさん / ジョンとメリー
Boobs / Celebrity? / Super Dad / Jon and Mary
episode.summary: Bunji wholeheartly draws something in his sketchbook. When Mom asks what it is, he says it`s boobs. So has spring come around the corner for Bunji? As Mom wonders what to do, the sentimental holy spirit appears. Celebrity? Mr. Mizunuma makes a call to Mom. He`s going to Mom`s place with an interviewer who is going to interview her. Mom who completely forgot about such a promise hurries to... ; Dad took Bunji and Fumi to a nearby supermarket to get dinner ingredients. "I am actually a professional shopper even though I don`t look like one!" So that`s what Dad boasts but...; Mom entrusted Ai to look after pet dog Jon. When she goes to fetch it, Jon happily runs around in Mr. Ooya`s big garden, that is right next to Ai`s apartment - it looks like he fell in love too... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 茶柱 / カメラマン / 男どうし / お宝ショップ
Tea Stem / Photographer / Between Men / Treasure Shop
episode.summary: Tea Stem Mom`s assistant Ai is mad over marriage. But it doesn`t go well, and she can`t even manage a marriage interview. And because of that, she`s on edge. Mom tries to encourage her, but... Photographer Bunji takes out Dad`s work tool, his camera. With his best friends, Ma, Chi and Daichi, he heads off to the streets to take interesting photos. Between Men Mr. Mizunuma, who works in a major publishing company and is in charge of Mom`s publishing, heads home early one evening. Thinking that he`ll get home early, he hurries back, but he gets called by Dad, saying that they should drink together, and... Treasure Shop Targeting the special Hopperman card that came in this month`s magazine supplement, Bunji and Dad go around to the neighborhood`s bookstores looking for it. But they can`t find it in any stores. Perplexed, they walk into this shop with a sign that says "Treasure Shop"... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪夢 / 男の減量 / 恐竜博へGO! / おばあちゃん, と
Bad Dream / Man`s Diet / Professor Dinosaur, Go! / With Grandma
episode.summary: Bad Dream In the strange dream that Fumi has, an unknown cone-shaped object walks with her. When it eats a stone, it splits into two. Fumi wakes up frightened, but... A Man`s Diet Dad gets a big shock when Fumi pokes at his stomach and calls it blubbery. Dad gives his all to the challenge, but... Professor Dinosaur, Go! Mom arrives at the dinosaur museum with Bunji and Daichi. As usual, the simple-minded Bunji walks in, but Daichi surprisingly knows a lot about dinosaurs! With Grandma One day after the sun starts to set and everyone else is out, Fumi and Grandma are at home. They sit on the porch side by side, eating snacks and talking at the same time. A relaxed atmosphere is flowing. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぴにゃりの惑星 / 麦ちゃん怒る / 麦ちゃんの逆襲 / 夏休み
Planet of the Pinyari / Mugi Gets Angry / Mugi`s Counterattack / Summer Vacation
episode.summary: Planet of the Pinyari A drifting spacecraft lands on some planet and the hatch opens. What comes out from it is the Pinyari! The Pinyari sets off to explore the mysterious planet, but... Mugi Gets Angry Mugi, the mom of 5 boys, stumbles into Mom`s place. She says today is the day that she got too tired looking after them. After resting at Mom`s place, she and Mom head off to Mugi`s place... Commugi`s Counterattack Mom had no choice but to look after the Mugi Five to let Mugi rest for a day. But with Bunji and five boys, the boys powers exceed Mom`s expectations... Summer Vacation You got the blues from hearing the words "summer vacation"! It`s you isn`t it, Mom? According to Mom`s stories, it`s scary "summer vacation" for her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 指輪の値段 / おまねき / 白ふみ黒ふみ4 / 桃タロ子
A Ring`s Value / Invitation / White and Black and Brother / Momotaroko
episode.summary: A Ring`s Value A ring appears out of the drawer that Dad gave to Mom a long time ago. Mom tells Fumi about her memories from back then. Invitation It seems that inviting friends over is popular in Fumi`s class. Fumi says that she invited her friends over, but the children`s room is in a mess and there`s only beer tidbits for snacks... White Fumi Black Fumi 4 Fumi somehow manages to invite her friends over. From talking about their families, the story transfers to talking about Bunji. That`s when Bunji comes home. Fumi, who doesn`t want to show the ugly side of Bunji... Momotaro Kid Everyone knows about the story of Momotaro. Grandfather Bunji has gone to the mountain to gather firewood and Grandmother Fumi does the laundry. That`s when a huge peach floats down the river. When they open the peach, that`s when Momotaro Kid, Mom, appears! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウトウト / ヘトヘト / プカプカ / ヒヤヒヤ
Zzz / Tired / Float, Float / Chilly
episode.summary: Zzz In the middle of summer, the Kamohara family has decided to go to a huge pool. The night before, Bunji and Fumi are looking forward to it and are unable to sleep... Tired Mom and her family got to the pool. But Mom was not able to get into the beauty salon because it was full and Dad lost sight of Bunji and Fumi... Float, Float Bunji and Fumi got to the children`s water slide. When Bunji falls down with a splash, his suit got stuck in between his butt, and it became a T-back. People around him got a big laugh. When Dad saw that, he got worried about Fumi. Chilly When Dad won the battle of rock paper scissors over who gets to drive home, he gets to drink lots of beer. On the other hand, Mom, who lost the battle and has to drive, had to bear it. And the time came when she had to drive... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ねむい / 絵日記 / ゆかた / お祭り
Sleepy / Art Diary / Yukata / Festival
episode.summary: Sleepy During summer vacation, there`s morning exercise. Just three more days and they will win a prize. Bunji and the others got excited over it. The problem is, Bunji might not be able to wake up. So, Ma and his friends have promised to take turns waking him up. Art Diary Bunji`s art diary is somewhat funny. He goes out with his friends to the pool and on the way back home, they have shaved ice, but Daichi ate shaved ice that`s as high as the ceiling, or that`s how it`s drawn. The other days become more suspicious... Yukata Fumi looked at a yukata advertisement and her eyes got all sparkly. Faced with no choice, they`ve gone downtown to buy it, only to see lots of stores on the street getting prepared for a festival tonight... Festival During the festival night, the Kamohara family has come down to scoop some goldfish. The night got lit up by fireworks and all adults turned back into children. A magical moment. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミニトマト / ひとり旅 / より道名人 / ぴにゃり大喜利
Mini Tomatoes / Traveling Alone / Expert on Walking Along the Way / Pinyari Comedy Show
episode.summary: Mini Tomatoes Fumi says that she wants to grow flowers at home. But what Mom bought was tomato seeds. Well, Mom says that if she`s going to plant something, she might as well plant something that`s more useful. But Grandma, who is passionate about gardening, blows up! Traveling Alone One summer day, Bunji decides to travel across the bridge where he has never been. Streets that he doesn`t know, children that he doesn`t know, shops that he doesn`t know... This is what Bunji experiences, his first trip alone. Expert on Walking Along the Way Fumi, who loves to stroll, gives a name to every stray cat in the neighborhood, and becomes friends with them, but nowadays she brings in information about the neighborhood. Pinyari Comedy Show The well known pinyari comedy show has begun! The chairman is obviously a pinyari. The participants are, of course, pinyari too. So the question is, what is today`s topic? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 精霊の政令 / かえり道 / 幸せになりたい / ごきげん
The Path to Return / Spirits` Diligence / Want to Be Happy / Pleasant
episode.summary: Spirits` Diligence his is the world of the spirits. The Early Education spirit and the Sentimental Education spirit are having a big battle in the public. Both parties try to get the Yutori spirit to join, but... On the Way Home On the way home from school, Bunji made up rules such as "If I can`t find a dog before I count to twenty, the world will explode!" He keeps thinking of things like that and panics! Want to Be Happy Today, late at night, the man in charge of publishing, Mr. Mizunuma, is waiting for Mom`s work. Mom is drawing. Dad comes in and talks about work and family and the men spend time talking to each other... Happy Today, Fumi is pouting. But actually, when Fumi was changing early in the morning, Mom said "Oh, you`re pouting." That`s what she randomly decided, so that`s why Fumi didn`t have a choice but to do so. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワイハー / ワイハー最高 / はじめました / さんぽ
Waiha / Waiha is the Best / Begin / Stroll
episode.summary: Waiha During summer vacation, Bunji and Fumi complained that they were bored. Dad said that he promised to bring them anywhere. That`s what Dad said, but Bunji and Fumi said that they want to go to Hawaii. As Dad got into a dilemma, the move that he made is... Waiha is the Best The Kamohara family is currently in the middle of the Waiha tour. Mr. Mizunuma and Ai, and on top of that, Jon, all got dragged into the massive riot, but... Started Dad saw a poster out at a noodle shop shuddered. When he came back home, he took out a brush and ink and wrote, "Dad has also started making cold Chinese noodles!" Stroll On a hot, hot summer day, in a park that`s surrounded by greenery, Mom, Bunji and Fumi randomly walk around. In the late afternoon, it feels like it got a bit cooler. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未来の姿 / 時間旅行 / 男って... / 小1の夏休み
Boys Are... / Time Travel / Future Appearance / First Grade Summer Vacation
episode.summary: Future Appearance Mom`s assistant, Ai, falls in love at first sight with a cool-looking guy working at the supermarket. At that moment, the cupids , who only Ai can see, appear. They give her a magical stick, but... Time Travel Mom, who is a manga artist, has to draw a story based on autumn, and struggles because it`s hot summer right now. Bunji and Fumi saw her and helped her to make it feel like autumn. Boys Are... Fumi starts arguing with her rival, Kanna, over a small thing. In the future, they will live in certain big houses, when their husbands come back, they will prepare certain dishes. Neither of them are backing down... First Grade Summer Vacation The last day of summer vacation, it`s unfortunately raining, but Bunji, who is wearing a raincoat, plays feverishly. Mom kind of understands Bunji`s feelings. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特別な日 / 成長 / わかれ / ねこむすめ
A Special Day / Growing Up / Farewell / Cat Daughter
episode.summary: A Special Day New clothes and a lot of presents! Fumi is very happy, while Bunji, who looks at them, gets very annoyed. That`s right, today is Fumi`s first day of school entrance ceremony. A new spring has arrived at the Kamohara family. Growing Up Bunji, who has gone up to the next grade, is in the same class as his good friends Ma, Chi, Daichi, Chinatsu and so on. Bunji feels relieved. Meanwhile, the teacher is deciding on the committee members, but... Farewell Bunji, who is now in the third grade, gets upset when the girls talked casually. Bunji tries to call upon his imaginary friend, Aso, who does not appear right away... Cat Daughter The much-loved dog of the Kamohara family, Jon, has left the family to marry and live with Mary. Meanwhile, Fumi, who loves cats, pesters Mom to get a cat as usual... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うちのかみさん / ガールズ / ボクの弟 / パパ友
My Kisses / Gals / My Brother / Grandmother Friends
episode.summary: My Misses Mr. Mizunuma, who is in charge of Mom, looks different. Of course, he has to be, since the other day he got married and is in the middle of his newlywed life. Gals Fumi, Kanna and Yuki, who have become elementary school students, gathered with only girls in the room and enjoyed talking about whatever. Their topic naturally became the stupid boys in their class. My Brother Kiku and Tora are the two cats that have come to the Kamohara family. Compared with Kiku, who is very tame, Bunji got to be in charge of Tora, since he is more troublesome. CGrandmother Friends Grandma is at the hospital, and her good friends Sakie and Iyo, started a very heartfelt conversation. That`s right, the three of them are not "mom friends" but "grandmother friends." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レディースパック / メガネ / フレキシブル / 一年生
Ladies Package / Glasses / Flexible / First Grade
episode.summary: Ladies Package Grandma and Fumi have come to a spa resort. Grandma complains about everything and Mom gets ticked off over time... Glasses Bunji`s best friend, Chi, is acting strange. What happened is Chi`s eyesight has become poor and he has to wear glasses from now on. He was embarrassed and was not able to wear them. Flexible Bunji, who is in the third grade, is hopeless when it comes to studying. Chi has started to go to cram school and Mom is in a dilemma over whether to send her son to one as well. That`s when the early stage education spirit shows up. First Grade Fumi, who is in first grade, is starting to act more like a big girl. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 成長したか? / 流行りもの / 夢は, はかなく / パパ似
Grown Up? / Trendy Things / Dreams, Short Lived / Look Like Dad
episode.summary: Grown Up? Mom is in a big rush as it`s close to the deadline. That is when Bunji popped in and started to play. Bunji kept on barging in and pestering Mom to play with him. Mom accidentally had a slip of the tongue... Trendy Things Chinatsu pointed out Bunji`s t-shirt being tucked in and said it looked uncool. Bunji decides to tuck his shirt in. With Ma and his friends, they tried the trendy "low pants" look out... Dreams, Short Lived Love is something that appears out of nowhere... Fumi falls in love with her classmate who is good at soccer. At home, she acts like a young girl who gives off a pink aura and her Dad sheds tears... Looks Like Dad When Fumi was young, she got mad when people said that she looked like her Dad. It seems she doesn`t like the idea of comparing a middle-aged man to a young girl... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 馬と鹿 / 塾 / 君の瞳に, 完敗 / ボクの靴, 知りませんか?
Horse and Deer / Cram School / In your Eyes / Do You Know Where My Shoes Are?
episode.summary: Horse and Deer Bunji and Ma are at home doing homework together. When Mom observes the two of them, the two of them just keep on showing the same level of stupidity... Cram School Chi, who has gone to cram school first, has caused Mom and her friends to decide their children should go to cram school too. But there`s an examination before entering the cram school. Complete Loss to Your Eye Dad`s ideal man, that is, dandyism and wildness, a man back in those old days... In an imaginary world, Dad starts to act like one, but... Do You Know Where My Shoes Are? One autumn morning, Dad woke up and felt like going for a walk. When he got to the doorway, there was a pair of shoes that he didn`t recognize. There are no guests and they aren`t his either. Just what is going on... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネコの性格 / バス遠足 / コンプリート / ウンポコピー
Cat`s Characteristics / Field Trip / Complete / Unpokopi
episode.summary: A Cat`s Characteristics Two cats have joined the Kamohara family. The male Tora likes to do things at his own pace. The female Kiku has a good relationship with Dad. One day, Dad ate Kiku`s food, and strange things start to happen. Field Trip Fumi, who has moved on to the first grade is on her first field trip. Kanna, Yuki, cool looking Masa, and bad Takashi are having fun in the bus as usual, but thirty minutes later, something happens... Complete Mr. Mizunuma who is in charge of Mom`s publication, is a figure collector. As he is not able to keep them at home, he asks Mom to put them at her work place, and... Unpokopi Right now, Bunji and his school mates are into the Unpoko dance. It was first done by a TV comedy show, but it somehow has managed to get into the elementary school and right now it`s a huge trend. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小さなペンタゴン / ハートのペンタゴン / 夢の彼氏 / ひとり寝
Small Pentagon / Heart Pentagon / Dream Boyfriend / Sleeping Alone
episode.summary: Tiny Pentagon It has been one month since Bunji started to go to cram school. Mom looks at the pentagon graph, where it shows the strengths and weaknesses of five different subjects. That`s when the Early Education Spirit appears. Heart Pentagon Mom thought Bunji is studying for his test, but he turns out to be doodling. Mom was about to tell him off, but that is when a Love Spirit that looks like Dad appears! Dream Boyfriend The street down by the seaside. A red convertible sports car dashes down the road. There`s a cool looking blond guy in the driver`s seat. And then in the passenger seat, Fumi...? Sleeping Alone A story that happened a little while ago. Bunji and Fumi usually sleep together, but as Bunji`s snoring is too loud, both of them tried to sleep by themselves... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レギンス男子 / パジャマ / 三角折り / わり算
Leggings Guys / Pajamas / Folding Into Triangles / Division
episode.summary: Leggings Guys One day, Ma came in wearing leggings under his pants. The word has a pleasant ring to Bunji`s ears and he got fascinated by it. When he got home, he bugged Mom because he wanted to wear them. Pajamas Mom got to a party that the company organized. When Mom was about to deposit her coat at the cloak room, she realized that she was still wearing her pajamas. She tried to get out of the situation, but... Folding Into Triangles Fumi loves to fold supermarket plastic bags into triangles. She folds them with Mom. but as Mom`s deadline is close, she can`t stick around with Fumi. A while later, Mom checks out what Fumi has done. Division Mom`s Life style math study time has arrived! Today`s theme is division! Can you answer the questions that Mom asks?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 学級新聞 / プレゼント? / 昼下がり / 人生...って?
Class News / Present? / Early Afternoon / Life... What is it?
episode.summary: Class News Bunji and his friends, the four stupid boys, are in charge of creating a class newsletter. Mom gives the advice "you can`t do the same things as others" and "gather it with your feet" so the four of them walk down the street... Present? In this world, there are some things that boys do that girls don`t understand. This story starts when Fumi gets a monster drawing from Jo who only plays scissors... Early Afternoon One early afternoon, Dad is sitting on a bench and a salaryman slowly sits down. On one side is Dad, who is wearing shorts and sandals, while on the other hand the salaryman is wearing a suit. There is a weird atmosphere, but... Life... What Is It? Mom is sick with a cold. Looking for someone to look after her, she talks to Bunji since he is home, but he asks "What is life?" and "Why do I have to study everyday?" He brings his thoughts to Mom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 授業参観 / だっこ / からあげ力 / フクザツ
Class Visit / Carry / Deep Friend Chicken Power / Complicated
episode.summary: Class Visit Mom and her friends have come to visit Bunji`s class. Today is a moral education class, so maybe they won`t expose their stupidity too much? That`s what they were hoping for, but... Carry While Mom listens to the story of a young mom who lives in the neighborhood, she remembers the time when Bunji and Fumi were little. She remembers when she had to carry them around or they wouldn`t sleep... Deep Fried Chicken Power Bunji is in the backyard digging, and he kept on digging. That is a sign that he`s not feeling well, so that is when Mom and Dad try to do this and that to get him back, but... Complicated Fumi throws her frustration to Mom because she got bullied in class. "Why did she bully me?" As Mom listens to Fumi`s story, she remembers a time when she had something similar happen to her... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パパは強し / 転校生 / 一年生と六年生 / みんなそろって
Grandmas are Strong / Transfer Student / First Grade and Sixth Grade / Everyone Together
episode.summary: Grandmas Are Strong Grandma and her best friends, Sakie and Iyo, gathered together to discuss what books to read at the children`s gathering. In one of the discussions, one said that she would like to sleep like Snow White... Transfer Student In Bunji`s class, there is a new transfer student named Minoru. Bunji tries to look after him but his attitude is difficult. Bunji decides to follow Minoru after school... First Grade and Sixth Grade Fumi has recently become good friends with Sho who is in sixth grade. When she becomes friends with her, she has started to grow and become a big girl, but... Everyone Together Mom and her family, all four of them, have come to a department store. Dad always gets excited, but Bunji and Fumi are used to it. Dad decides to raise the stakes and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 占い / お弁当 / イチゴ一会 / DNA
Fortune Telling / Boxed Lunch / Strawberry, An Encounter / Chip Off the Old Block
episode.summary: Fortune Telling In Bunji`s class, fortune telling is becoming quite big with the girls, and it seems that Bunji and Chinatsu are the most compatible no matter what fortune telling method is used. With that, Chinatsu is to go over to Bunji`s place, but... Boxed Lunch It`s a day where the whole school has a sketch competition. Fumi is not so good at drawing. In order to make herself feel better, she gets Mom to make her a character boxed lunch. When she opens the cover, Bunji`s exciting lunch is inside! Strawberry, An Encounter Meanwhile, Bunji and his friends stopped sketching and went out to play. Getting lost at a strawberry farm, they got caught by an old man farmer and Bunji didn`t manage to escape. DNA Recently, Bunji has started to resemble Dad. If he grows up to be an adult, there`s one thing to do: play ball! So says Dad, who`s excited... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イチバン / ゆきおんな / きづかい / 集中
First / Snow Woman / Considerate / Concentrate
episode.summary: First While the TV is showing a couple of athletes on the podium, Dad tells Bunji "Whatever you aim for, you have to be first! There`s a big difference between first and second!" The next day, Bunji heads off to school to be first and does other things. Snow Woman In the next fun meeting, there`s a class play, and Fumi gets to play the role of Snow Woman. She`s all excited over it, but when she watches Snow Woman in a scary TV program, she completely loses interest in doing it. Considerate Recently, even though Grandma is doing her usual things and doesn`t get bothered, there are plenty of times where others go out of their way to be considerate. Today, on the bus, and at the park as well ... Concentrate Being tied down to a tight schedule, Mom has to concentrate on her job. If she stays at home, it`s too noisy for her, so that`s why she tries to escape to a family restaurant or a coffee shop, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夫婦喧嘩 / けいたい! / セクシーデュオ / アルバム
Husband and Wife Argument / Cell Phone! / Sexy Duo / Album
episode.summary: Husband and Wife Argument Mr. Mizunuma is waiting for Mom`s work. It should be close to the deadline, yet he`s not edgy. It looks like it`s the early days of marriage - he`s worrying about a husband and wife argument. When Mom listens to his worries... Cell Phone! Chi got a cell phone and Bunji bugs Mom for one. He gets told that he`s too young and she doesn`t get him one. Meanwhile, Bunji and Chi send each other messages through Mom`s cell phone... Sexy duo While looking for cute clothes at a shopping mall, a young girl comes over and says "Sis, want to have debut with me?" Mom wonders about it but Fumi thinks "it`s not bad" and gets excited... Album Dad and Mom are in the middle of arranging photos for albums. Bunji`s photos get sorted and he has two albums. On the other hand, Fumi has fewer photos and doesn`t even have one full album. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アルバイト / 女みがき / 京都へいこう! / 猫とかあさん
Part Time / Women`s Skills / Let`s Go To Kyoto! / Cats and Mom
episode.summary: There`s something that Bunji wants so badly, so that`s how he started off doing part time work at home. Cleaning the toilet and bath, every time he does one task, he gets 50 yen. A happy Bunji got worked up, but... Women`s Skills Kanna and Yuki both seem to be able to cook by themselves. Fumi was surprised by this and said that she wanted to make beef stroganoff. Mom has her hands full with work and gets Ai to do it, but... Let`s Go To Kyoto! hinking deep thoughts, Dad decides to go on a trip by himself. Dad enjoys sightseeing during the daytime and decides to splurge at night at an inn. But because he`s not a familiar customer, he gets refused and has trouble finding one... Cats and Mom Mom is home by herself, working at her own pace. Kiku the cat keeps on bugging her so Mom plays with her. Then Tora comes in. The cats keep playing around and having fun, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トラウマ / おばあちゃんのケータイ / 事実は小説より奇なり / ネジまわし
Trauma / Grandma`s Cell Phone / Reality is Stranger Than Fiction / Turning the Screws
episode.summary: Trauma Bunji and Fumi are in the bath when a the power goes out. Actually, Fumi hates dark and small places. When Bunji sees Fumi crying, he tells her that he will be right back after finding a flashlight and goes out looking for one... Grandma`s Cell Phone Bunji still wants a cell phone and he gets to borrow one from Grandma. When he`s playing around with it with Chi, Grandma`s friend Sakie gives it a call... Reality Is Stranger Than Fiction When Mom runs out of ideas for her manga, she gets out to the streets and observes people. There are as many dramas as the number of people out there. Turning the Screws All of a sudden, Bunji starts to turn a lot of screws on lots of things with a screwdriver. He could turn out to be an engineer. That`s what Dad and Mom hoped for, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一日の恋 / おすもうサンタ / おばあちゃんの味 / 子離れ
One Day Love / Sumo Santa / Grandma`s Taste / Letting Children Go
episode.summary: One Day Love Fumi is putting a lot of effort into handmade cookies. She says that they`re a Christmas present for an older classmate hat she admires: Takahiro. She even wrapped them up with cute wrapping paper and gives it to him, but... Sumo Santa Mom and her friends as well as their children have gathered at the Kamohara house for a Christmas party. While the moms are boasting about the chicken dishes they made at home from leftovers, Dad, who feels like he doesn`t have a place to go, keeps on walking... Grandma`s Taste Fumi and Mom argued and both of them shut themselves in their rooms. But when Grandma cooks nostalgic caramel cookie in the kitchen, Mom gets lured by the sweet smell... Letting Children Go Lately, there are times when Mom feels lonely. Times when the children go straight back to their room right after dinner, times when Mom feels that Bunji`s shoes are unusually large... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お年玉 / さけび初め / 今年も, 一日一麺 / おとな? こども?
Otoshidama / Screaming For the First Time / This Year Will Be a Bowl of Noodles Every Day, Too / Adult? Child?
episode.summary: Otoshidama This year on New Year`s day, the Kamohara house is very lively since Mom`s brother has come up from Kochi with his family. Inside the house, the boys are getting excited over otoshidama while Fumi is standing... Screaming For the First Time Mom`s brother and Dad have taken the children to the amusement park. But the two of them actually don`t like roller coasters. They try to avoid getting into the machine, but... This Year Will Be a Bowl of Noodles a Day, Too Bored with the usual New Year`s food, Mom and the family have come to a private room at a restaurant. But Bunji and his cousin couldn`t wait for the courses so they played games and read manga. They just couldn`t sit still. Adult? Child? Mom yells at Dad who is lying on the floor, saying that he`s like a child. Dad uses those words and says that he`s a child! And he`s about to find out the limits of how much freedom he can have... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 胃袋 / おかん / 娘よ / 乙女の会
Stomach / Moms / Daughter / Maiden Club
episode.summary: Stomach Mom is busy preparing for Bunji`s birthday party. Bunji said that Ma, Chi, Daichi and the others will be coming. The usual friends have arrived, but for some reason the door bell keeps on ringing. Moms Bunji is reading manga in a convenience store when his classmate Louis, a foreigner, comes in. Louis gives him 1000 yen and says that it`s his present so he can buy the manga. Daughter Fumi is going away to a winter camp for three days. This is the first time that Fumi will be away for so long and Mom is feeling uneasy. Meanwhile, Fumi... Maiden Club Grandma, Sakie and Iyo, the three good grandmother friends, are meeting to discuss the next round of reading material. Out of the blue the three of them decide to come up with ideas to name their club, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 九州へ / 長崎にて / 座敷わらし / ただいま
To Kyushu / In Nagasaki / Zashiki-warashi / We`re Back
episode.summary: To Kyushu Mom and her family have gone to Kyushu for a family vacation. Dad takes them around and the first place they go is in Hakata to have the real Hakata ramen. "It`s delicious!" While everyone is impressed, Dad has a slightly different response. In Nagasaki Even in Nagasaki, Mom and her family have gone to have champon and see Dejima. While they are enjoying the trip, when Mom turns around, her handbag is nowhere to be seen! Zashiki-warashi At Kagoshima, Mom and her family have decided to stay one night at an inn. At the inn, Bunji gets lost and he coincidentally meets a girl smaller than Fumi. He gets along with her and starts having fun, but... We`re Back Going to Ibusuki`s sand bath and enjoying the glass-making class. A lot has happened, but a family trip is really good. That`s what they thought when they traveled back. At home, Grandma and Ai are waiting. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小さなプライド / 子は親の鏡 / 素直で元気 / スタイル
Small Pride / Children are Mirror Images of Parents / Honest and Healthy / Style
episode.summary: Small Pride Bunji and Ma are doing the Unpoko Dance but Chi is the only one who staying back and watching. When Mom asks Chi why he`s not doing it, he ran to the toilet... Children Are Mirror Images of Parents Even though they are in elementary school, the fighting never stops, and Mom gets angry at Bunji and Fumi. When Dad walks by, she tells him to do something about it. When he hears about it, he does so reluctantly, and Mom`s anger turns to him. Honest and Healthy Today, Mom is at the center of the topic of talking about children. Boys are stupid, yet being honest and healthy is more important. While that opinion has started to dominate, the powerful Mrs. Gonda says something else. Style When Mom goes out with her usual clothes, Fumi stops her and tells her that it`s ugly to walk out in such clothes. And Fumi starts to coordinate what to wear, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おるすばん / つづく / 雪アソビ / ありがとう
Looking After the House / To Be Continued / Playing in Snow / Thank You
episode.summary: Looking After the HouseThere is a day when Bunji and Fumi are looking after their home until the late afternoon. Both of them eat pudding, play games, and have fun by themselves, but Fumi starts to feel a bit lonely... To Be Continued Mom continues to be disappointed with Bunji`s poor results. That is when the relaxed education spirit appears. When the spirit says that a good university and good job don`t mean everything, Mom can`t argue, but... Playing With Snow There is a day with a big snowstorm. Dad invites Bunji and Fumi to a snowball fight, but the two of them are not interested. That`s when Dad gets a hold of Mom, who is stuck with her manga ideas, for a change of atmosphere, and gets her to play in the snowball fight, but... Thank You When Mom was a child,she wanted to be an adult. It seemed to her at the time that she would be able to doanything she wanted and could go anywhere she wanted. But time just doesn`t pass at all... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 野良犬みたいに / ドットのハンカチ / 大合作 / ミニ縁日
Like a Stray Dog / Dotted Hankerchief / Big Collaboration / Mini Festival
episode.summary: Like A Stray Dog Bunji has met Taiga, who is five years older than him, and whom he hasn`t seen for a while. He was heavily influenced by his bad boy behavior. A stray dog lies around and he says that if it gets tamed, it`s over, but... Dotted Handkerchief Fumi has a favorite dotted handkerchief. There`s a jinx that if she carries it around, she will get along with anyone. Carrying that, she was about to confess her love to an upperclassman, but when she sees one of her classmates is going to be transferred to another school... Big Collaboration Bunji is supposed make an art piece in a group using paper mache. But everyone wants to make their own — a fire truck, a dinosaur, a castle — and what they want to make don`t match, so they each started to make on their own... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スタンプ / 精霊のひとりごと / 父と娘 / 似たもの夫婦
Stamp / Story of a Spirit / Father and Daughter / Similar Couple
episode.summary: There`s a stamp boom in the Kamohara family. If someone does a good thing for Mom, they get a stamp, and if you receive thirty of them, Mom will get you anything. The sentimental spirit appears in front of Mom after a long absence, but he`s got a lot more grey hairs and he`s clearly depressed. A day when Dad and Fumi are looking after the house. Dad doesn`t realize that Fumi is a bit lonely on the inside.The Kamohara family pets are Jon the dog and Kiku and Tora, the cats. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旦那の育て方 / スター☆ぶんじ / ウインナちゃん / かあさん誕生日
Ways of Raising Husbands / Star - Bunji / Wiener / Mom Birthday
episode.summary: Ways of Raising Husbands Snack Moms are still in business. Tonight`s topic would be "talking about husbands." While the five of them talk about themselves raising their children, the words that Mugi said were... Star - Bunji In Grandma`s room. Grandma`s good friends, Sakie and Iyo, have come to chat. Bunji brings them snacks and gets caught by the two of them telling him that he`s a handsome man, he`s interesting, and so on. He doesn`t feel that he`s being ill-treated. Wiener Fumi has always loved Mom`s poorly-made wiener octopuses. The reason why she calls them Wiener is because, to her, they`re her precious friends that will save her from a tight spot. Mom Birthday To moms, their children`s birthday are like their birthdays too. Speaking of which, Mugi`s twins` birthday is coming up soon, so it looks like Mom is coming up with a plan... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネコの手 / 子の心, 親知らず / しりとり / おじいちゃんのめがね
Cat`s Hand / A Child`s Heart Parent Doesn`t Know / Shiritori / Grandfather`s Glasses
episode.summary: Cat`s Hand Mom is pulling an all-nighter. She puts in all her effort and faces the table but there are two cats on it: Kiku and Tora are lying on it. She keeps on getting disturbed by them and when she tries to get rid of them... A Child`s Heart: Parent Doesn`t Know Mom and Bunji play hard in an arcade. Mom is feeling high-strung the whole time, crunching on snacks, eating right outside an outdoor store, and so on, and she drags Bunji along. Shiritori Bunji and Fumi started a game of shiritori. The entire conversation has become shiritori. And after some time, Dad, Mom, and Grandma got involved too... Grandfather`s Glasses From an unexpected source, Fumi starts thinking about what death is. She wonders if people become stars when they die. When Mom sees her, she brings out her memento of her late grandfather, his glasses, and starts talking to her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 肉食系男子 / ロンリー・ドライバー / 危機到来! / 一日二麺
Carnivorous Boys / Lonely Driver / Arrival of Crisis! / Two Bowls of Noodles a Day
episode.summary: Carnivorous boys On the day of Bunji`s karate promotion competition, Mom, who overslept, hastily came up with a simple bento. She felt sorry for Bunji, so during lunch time, she brought in a bit of food. What she saw in everyone`s bento... Lonely Driver Dad, who thought he would be able to enjoy a drive by himself, ending up taking Mom, Fumi, and Grandma - three women - shopping. Dad gets shuffled around by the women`s pace... Arrival of Crisis! Dad and Mom argued over a small thing. Both of them refuse to back down and when Bunji and Fumi saw it, they... Two Bowls of Noodles a Day Dad and Mom are still in the middle of an argument. Bunji and Fumi try to think of ways to make them reconcile, and use all their brain cells, but it just doesn`t work well... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: くつ下 / カラフル / ずっと, かあさん
Socks / Colorful / Forever Mom
episode.summary: The End Socks Today Mom and her mom friends are having Snack Moms. Tonight`s topic is "why does only one of the pair of the males` socks disappear?" Every household has its own sad stories. Colorful Recently, Fumi has started to help out at home. White and Black Fumi have appeared to talk about her, and when they started to argue, that is when the colorful Fumi appears! Forever Mom Mom is always busy with housework. Bunji and Fumi play with their friends, cry, laugh and so on. Dad is always cheerful, Grandma is always annoying. What doesn`t change on a daily basis is.. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男が生まれた日 / 男のハンバーグ / 男のヒミツ / 学校を休んだ日
The Day a Baby Boy Was Born / A Man`s Hamburger / Men`s Secret / Taking a Day Off From School
episode.summary: The Day a Baby Boy Was Born This is the day when Bunji was born, some time ago. Dad, who is trying to reach the maternity ward, keeps on meeting people who need help. Because he`s going to be a father, Dad couldn`t just leave them alone. A Man`s Hamburger Dad said that he`s going to make man`s hamburgers. This is something that Dad learned while he was working part time and a dish that women and children are not allowed to help with! A Men`s Secret Bunji and his friends are hanging out in his room. When Dad takes a quick look inside, he sees women posing and sketches of women! Dad panics and swears he`ll protect the secret. Taking a Day Off From School When Mom was small, she often had to take days off because she was sick. When that happened, her mom would make pureed apples for her. When Mom thinks about it, half of that sweetness is because her mom would be nicer to her than usual... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: べっちょり（4/1）受けた（4/1）太陽にほえろ!（4/1）あ・そう・と（4/1）ごあいさつ（4/1）カニ母（4/1）メール
